j:translation_en.description:
LUXE PROPERTIES ASIA is established in Singapore, Bangkok, and Shanghai, specializing in luxury real estate. We assist a discerning clientele in their search for exceptional residences, high-end apartments, and exclusive villas in the most prestigious destinations across Asia.
Our expertise lies in an in-depth knowledge of local markets and a rigorous selection of rare properties that combine design, comfort, and prime locations.
Whether for an investment, a primary residence, or a secondary home, we provide a tailor-made, discreet, and personalized service.
From the first visit to the final acquisition, our multilingual team guides you through every step with professionalism and confidentiality.
With LUXE PROPERTIES, discover a unique art of living and bring your most ambitious real estate projects to life.
j:translation_en.name: Luxe Asia

j:translation_en.description:
This villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury, offering a modern and refined living environment with a touch of sophistication. Perched on a hill overlooking the sea, this contemporary home boasts stunning views of the azure horizon and the endless blue of the Mediterranean. With its sleek design and clean lines, this villa is a true architectural masterpiece, providing an unparalleled living experience in a spectacular setting.

The interior of the villa is a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and luxurious comfort. The bright and airy living spaces are thoughtfully arranged to make the most of the breathtaking sea views, while high-end finishes add a touch of sophistication to every room.
j:translation_en.title: Large villa in Java

j:translation_fr.description:
This villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury, offering a modern and refined living environment with a touch of sophistication. Perched on a hill overlooking the sea, this contemporary home boasts stunning views of the azure horizon and the endless blue of the Mediterranean. The interior of the villa is a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and luxurious comfort. The bright and airy living spaces are thoughtfully arranged to make the most of the breathtaking sea views, while high-end finishes add a touch of sophistication to every room.
j:translation_fr.title: Trs grand villa Java

j:translation_en.description:
This post-modern seaside villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury. Designed with a distinctive architectural aesthetic, this residence strikes a perfect balance between elegance and functionality.

The bright and open living spaces are adorned with premium materials and stylish finishes, creating an ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. Expansive windows offer panoramic views of the ocean, while sunny terraces and the infinity pool beckon to fully enjoy the Mediterranean climate.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, provide luxurious comfort and complete privacy for residents and guests.
j:translation_en.title: Exceptional seaside villa - Java

j:translation_fr.description:
This post-modern seaside villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury. Designed with a distinctive architectural aesthetic, this residence strikes a perfect balance between elegance and functionality.

The bright and open living spaces are adorned with premium materials and stylish finishes, creating an ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. Expansive windows offer panoramic views of the ocean, while sunny terraces and the infinity pool beckon to fully enjoy the Mediterranean climate.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, provide luxurious comfort and complete privacy for residents and guests.
j:translation_fr.title: Exceptionnelle maison bord de mer

j:translation_en.description:
This villa epitomizes the essence of contemporary design. With its sleek lines and glass faade, this house dazzles at first sight. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a warm and airy atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the surrounding landscape.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, offer luxurious comfort and total privacy for residents and guests.

This house is designed for outdoor living. The expansive terrace, with its seating area and outdoor dining space, is the perfect spot to relax and soak up the sun. The garden provides an idyllic setting for outdoor activities and family relaxation.
j:translation_en.title: Bright house with panoramic view - Bandung

j:translation_fr.description:
This villa epitomizes the essence of contemporary design. With its sleek lines and glass faade, this house dazzles at first sight. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a warm and airy atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the surrounding landscape.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, offer luxurious comfort and total privacy for residents and guests.

This house is designed for outdoor living. The expansive terrace, with its seating area and outdoor dining space, is the perfect spot to relax and soak up the sun. The garden provides an idyllic setting for outdoor activities and family relaxation.
j:translation_fr.title: Maison lumineuse avec vue pan panoramique, Bandung

j:translation_en.description:
This modern house is a true architectural masterpiece, with its clean lines and high-end finishes. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the outdoor environment.

The villa features a spectacular master suite, complete with a private balcony offering stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The other bedrooms are also spacious and bright, providing comfortable space for family and guests. The main living area opens onto a sunny terrace, perfect for relaxing and outdoor entertaining.

The true centerpiece of the villa is its infinity pool, which offers spectacular views of the horizon. And for breathtaking views, the rooftop provides a privileged space to admire sunsets and starry nights.
j:translation_en.title: Bali old style mansion

j:translation_fr.description:
This modern house is a true architectural masterpiece, with its clean lines and high-end finishes. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the outdoor environment.

The villa features a spectacular master suite, complete with a private balcony offering stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The other bedrooms are also spacious and bright, providing comfortable space for family and guests. The main living area opens onto a sunny terrace, perfect for relaxing and outdoor entertaining.

The true centerpiece of the villa is its infinity pool, which offers spectacular views of the horizon. And for breathtaking views, the rooftop provides a privileged space to admire sunsets and starry nights.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa surplombant la mer

j:translation_en.description:
Set high above Sunset Plaza, this ultra-modern 700 sqm villa boasts breathtaking panoramic views of Hanoi. It includes 5 bedrooms, an internal elevator, and luxury finishes such as polished concrete floors, a Gaggenau kitchen, and expansive glass walls.

Outdoor amenities feature an infinity pool overlooking the city, a rooftop with jacuzzi, a 4-car garage, and a glass-enclosed pool house. An architectural gem, perfectly suited for a life of privacy, elegance, and glamour.
j:translation_en.title: Hanoi Architectural Villa with Rooftop & Sunset Views

j:translation_fr.description:
Set high above Sunset Plaza, this ultra-modern 700 sqm villa boasts breathtaking panoramic views of Pattaya. It includes 5 bedrooms, an internal elevator, and luxury finishes such as polished concrete floors, a Gaggenau kitchen, and expansive glass walls.

Outdoor amenities feature an infinity pool overlooking the city, a rooftop with jacuzzi, a 4-car garage, and a glass-enclosed pool house. An architectural gem, perfectly suited for a life of privacy, elegance, and glamour.
j:translation_fr.title: Pattaya, condo de vacances

j:translation_en.description:
Just minutes from downtown Palm Springs, this single-story designer residence offers 800 sqm of living space. Designed by an award-winning architect, it features 4 suites, an interior courtyard, and vast open spaces that flow seamlessly into the outdoors.

The 5,000 sqm lot includes an infinity pool, an outdoor spa, a lit tennis court, a 3-car garage, and an air-conditioned pool house. A home designed for relaxation and a refined desert lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: Pattaya full building

j:translation_fr.description:
Just minutes from downtown Pattaya, this six-story designer residence offers 2200 sqm of living space. Designed by an award-winning architect, it features 4 suites, an interior courtyard, and vast open spaces that flow seamlessly into the outdoors.

The 5,000 sqm lot includes an infinity pool, an outdoor spa, a lit tennis court, a 3-car garage, and an air-conditioned pool house. A home designed for relaxation and a refined desert lifestyle.
j:translation_fr.title: Pattaya Immeuble de rapport

j:translation_en.description:
Located on the prestigious Tabanan Beach, this 5-bedroom property blends Bali charm with modern elegance. Every room offers direct ocean views and access to a spacious teak terrace.

The home features a heated swimming pool, a pool house with an outdoor kitchen, a private screening room, a sauna, and a separate guest studio. A private beach accessible from the garden and a double garage with an electric charging station enhance the comfort of this rare beachfront estate.
j:translation_en.title: Beachfront Villa Tabanan, Bali

j:translation_fr.description:
Located on the prestigious Tabanan Beach, this 5-bedroom property blends Bali charm with modern elegance. Every room offers direct ocean views and access to a spacious teak terrace.

The home features a heated swimming pool, a pool house with an outdoor kitchen, a private screening room, a sauna, and a separate guest studio. A private beach accessible from the garden and a double garage with an electric charging station enhance the comfort of this rare beachfront estate.
j:translation_fr.title: Bord de mer, Tabanan

j:translation_en.description:
Perched atop a private hillside, this stunning 1,200 sqm contemporary villa offers breathtaking views of Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Featuring 6 en-suite bedrooms, the property is distinguished by its grand volumes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and interior design that seamlessly blends Italian marble with exotic wood finishes.

The landscaped grounds, spanning over 4,000 sqm, include a striking infinity mirror pool, a fully equipped pool house, an outdoor lounge area with a fireplace, and a professional-grade tennis court. Additional features include a secure garage for 5 vehicles, a wine cellar, a private cinema, a fitness room, and a cutting-edge smart home system — all contributing to the uniqueness of this exceptional estate.
j:translation_en.title: Traditional house in Cambodia capital

j:translation_fr.description:
Perched atop a private hillside, this stunning 1,200 sqm contemporary villa offers breathtaking views of Phnom Phen. Featuring 6 en-suite bedrooms, the property is distinguished by its grand volumes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and interior design that seamlessly blends Italian marble with exotic wood finishes.

The landscaped grounds, spanning over 4,000 sqm, include a striking infinity mirror pool, a fully equipped pool house, an outdoor lounge area with a fireplace, and a professional-grade tennis court. Additional features include a secure garage for 5 vehicles, a wine cellar, a private cinema, a fitness room, and a cutting-edge smart home system — all contributing to the uniqueness of this exceptional estate.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa traditionnelle Phnom Phen

j:translation_en.description: This breathtaking modern estate nestled in the hills of California redefines contemporary luxury. With over 10,000 square feet of living space, the home features soaring ceilings, expansive glass walls, and seamless indoor-outdoor living. The main level includes a grand foyer, formal living room with custom stone fireplace, open-plan gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining area overlooking the infinity-edge pool. Upstairs, the master suite offers a private terrace, spa-like bathroom, and walk-in closets. Additional amenities include a home theater, wine cellar, fitness studio, and guest quarters. The beautifully landscaped grounds also feature a zen garden, multiple water features, and a three-car garage. Perfectly situated for privacy, yet just minutes from the city, this estate is a rare architectural gem.
j:translation_en.title: River house, Bali

j:translation_fr.description: Contemporaine et chic, la River House est une retraite élégante à Pererenan, à Bali. Cette élégante villa de cinq chambres se trouve au bord d'une rivière et est entourée de cocotiers et de rizières fertiles.
j:translation_fr.title: Pererenan : villa en bord de rivire

j:translation_en.description: Located on the cliffs of Bali, this spectacular modern estate embodies the essence of tropical luxury. With more than 8,500 square feet of refined living space, the property is designed with open-plan interiors, double-height ceilings, and expansive glass walls framing unobstructed views of the Indian Ocean. The main level features a dramatic entryway, elegant living areas, a state-of-the-art gourmet kitchen, and a dining area opening directly to the pool terrace. The master suite offers a private balcony, a spa-style bathroom, and custom walk-in wardrobes. Additional features include a home theater, wine cellar, fitness pavilion, and private guest villas. The lush landscaped grounds include serene gardens, water features, and a three-car garage. Just minutes from Bali’s world-renowned beaches and resorts, this residence is a rare opportunity to own an oceanfront architectural gem.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Oceanfront Estate Indonesia

j:translation_en.description: Perched above the hills of Shanghai, this extraordinary modern estate offers over 12,000 square feet of living space and redefines contemporary elegance. Designed with soaring ceilings and expansive glass walls, the residence offers panoramic city views and a seamless connection between indoor and outdoor living. The main floor includes a grand foyer, a refined formal living area with custom stone detailing, a gourmet kitchen fitted with high-end European appliances, and a dining space overlooking the infinity-edge pool. The luxurious master suite features a private terrace, a spa-like marble bathroom, and designer walk-in closets. Additional highlights include a private cinema, wine cellar, gym, and guest quarters. The landscaped grounds feature tranquil gardens, water features, and a spacious garage. Offering both privacy and proximity to the city center, this estate is a rare architectural masterpiece.
j:translation_en.title: Modern Architectural Estate with Skyline Views China

j:translation_fr.description: Perched above the hills of Shanghai, this extraordinary modern estate offers over 12,000 square feet of living space and redefines contemporary elegance. The landscaped grounds feature tranquil gardens, water features, and a spacious garage. Offering both privacy and proximity to the city center, this estate is a rare architectural masterpiece.
j:translation_fr.title: Vue sur la Skyline de Shanghai Chine

j:translation_en.description: This stunning modern villa on the shores of Phuket redefines tropical luxury living. Spanning over 9,000 square feet, the property boasts soaring ceilings, floor-to-ceiling glass walls, and seamless indoor-outdoor spaces overlooking the turquoise Andaman Sea. The main level features a grand entrance, a spacious living room with natural stone finishes, an open-concept gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining area with breathtaking ocean views. The master suite includes a private terrace, spa-inspired bathroom, and expansive walk-in closets. Additional amenities include a home theater, wine cellar, private fitness studio, and guest suites. Surrounded by lush landscaped gardens with water features and a zen pavilion, this villa offers ultimate privacy while being just minutes from Phuket’s vibrant lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: Beachfront Villa with Infinity Pool Thailand

j:translation_fr.description: This stunning modern villa on the shores of Phuket redefines tropical luxury living. Spanning over 9,000 square feet, the property boasts soaring ceilings, floor-to-ceiling glass walls, and seamless indoor-outdoor spaces overlooking the turquoise Andaman Sea. The main level features a grand entrance, a spacious living room with natural stone finishes, an open-concept gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining area with breathtaking ocean views. The master suite includes a private terrace, spa-inspired bathroom, and expansive walk-in closets. Additional amenities include a home theater, wine cellar, private fitness studio, and guest suites. Surrounded by lush landscaped gardens with water features and a zen pavilion, this villa offers ultimate privacy while being just minutes from Phuket’s vibrant lifestyle.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa bord de mer Phuket

j:translation_en.description:
Experience elevated living in this exceptional duplex, perfectly positioned in one of Singapore’s most sought-after addresses. Offering breathtaking, unobstructed views of the skyline and Marina Bay, this residence blends modern elegance with ultimate comfort.

The spacious open-plan living and dining areas are framed by floor-to-ceiling windows, flooding the interiors with natural light. A sleek, fully equipped gourmet kitchen makes entertaining effortless, while the private balcony provides the perfect spot to enjoy stunning sunsets over the city.

The upper level features a luxurious master suite with a spa-inspired bathroom and walk-in wardrobe, alongside additional bedrooms designed for comfort and privacy. Exclusive building amenities include a rooftop infinity pool, fitness center, 24/7 concierge, and secure parking.

This rare duplex combines sophistication, prime location, and world-class facilities—an unparalleled opportunity to own a piece of Singapore’s luxury lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Duplex with Panoramic City Views Singapore

j:translation_fr.description:
Découvrez un art de vivre unique dans ce duplex d’exception, idéalement situé dans l’une des adresses les plus prestigieuses de Singapour. Offrant une vue imprenable et dégagée sur la skyline et Marina Bay, cette résidence allie élégance moderne et confort absolu.

Les vastes espaces de réception avec baies vitrées toute hauteur baignent l’appartement de lumière naturelle. La cuisine ouverte, entièrement équipée et haut de gamme, est idéale pour recevoir, tandis que le balcon privé permet de profiter de couchers de soleil spectaculaires sur la ville.

À l’étage, la suite parentale dispose d’une salle de bain digne d’un spa et d’un dressing spacieux, complétée par des chambres supplémentaires offrant intimité et confort. Les résidents bénéficient d’équipements exclusifs : piscine à débordement sur le rooftop, salle de sport, conciergerie 24/7 et parking sécurisé.

Ce duplex rare réunit sophistication, emplacement d’exception et prestations haut de gamme — une opportunité unique de vivre le luxe à Singapour.
j:translation_fr.title: Duplex de Luxe avec Vue Panoramique Singapour

j:translation_en.description: This breathtaking modern apartment in one of Bangkok’s newest luxury towers redefines contemporary living. With over 800 square meters of interior space and private terraces, the residence features soaring ceilings, expansive glass walls, and panoramic city views. The main living area includes a grand foyer, an elegant lounge, an open-plan gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining space overlooking the skyline. The master suite offers its own private terrace, a spa-inspired bathroom, and spacious walk-in closets. Additional highlights include a home theater, wine cellar, fitness studio, and guest suites. Residents also enjoy access to world-class amenities such as an infinity-edge pool, landscaped sky gardens, and dedicated concierge services. Perfectly situated in the heart of the city, this rare penthouse offers unparalleled luxury and exclusivity.
j:translation_en.title: Modern Architectural Estate with Infinity Pool California

j:translation_fr.description: Cet appartement moderne à couper le souffle, situé dans l’une des plus récentes tours de luxe de Bangkok, redéfinit l’art de vivre contemporain. Offrant plus de 800 m² d’espaces intérieurs et de terrasses privées, la résidence se distingue par ses plafonds majestueux, ses larges baies vitrées et ses vues panoramiques sur la ville. L’espace de vie principal comprend un grand hall d’entrée, un salon élégant, une cuisine américaine haut de gamme équipée d’appareils professionnels, ainsi qu’une salle à manger avec vue imprenable sur le skyline. La suite parentale dispose de sa propre terrasse privée, d’une salle de bain digne d’un spa et de vastes dressings. Parmi les autres prestations figurent une salle de cinéma privée, une cave à vin, un studio de fitness et des suites pour invités. Les résidents bénéficient également d’équipements de classe mondiale tels qu’une piscine à débordement, des jardins paysagers suspendus et un service de conciergerie exclusif. Idéalement situé au cœur de la ville, ce penthouse rare incarne luxe et exclusivité absolus.
j:translation_fr.title: Condo bluffant Bangkok

j:translation_fr.description:
LUXE PROPERTIES ASIA  est implantée à Singapour, Bangkok et Shanghai, et spécialisée dans l’immobilier de prestige. Nous accompagnons une clientèle exigeante à la recherche de résidences d’exception, d’appartements de standing et de villas exclusives au cœur des plus belles destinations d’Asie.
Notre expertise repose sur une parfaite connaissance des marchés locaux et une sélection rigoureuse de biens rares, alliant design, confort et emplacement stratégique.
Que ce soit pour un investissement, une résidence principale ou secondaire, nous offrons un service sur mesure, discret et personnalisé.
De la première visite à la finalisation de l’acquisition, notre équipe multilingue vous guide à chaque étape avec professionnalisme et confidentialité.
Avec LUXE PROPERTIES, découvrez un art de vivre unique et donnez vie à vos projets immobiliers les plus ambitieux.
j:translation_fr.name: Luxe - Asia

j:translation_en.description: We offer you an exclusive selection of prestigious properties, ranging from elegant apartments to historic mansions. Our dedicated team accompanies you at every stage of your real estate project, ensuring an exceptional experience for each client.
j:translation_en.name: Luxe - Europe

j:translation_fr.description: Nous vous offrons une slection exclusive de proprits prestigieuses, allant des appartements lgants aux demeures historiques. Notre quipe dvoue vous accompagne dans chaque tape de votre projet immobilier, garantissant une exprience exceptionnelle chaque client.
j:translation_fr.name: Luxe - Europe

j:translation_fr.description:
Situé dans l'un des quartiers les plus prestigieux de Paris, cet appartement parisien incarne l'élégance à la française dans toute sa splendeur. Niché au cœur du 8e arrondissement, à quelques pas des Champs-Élysées et de l'Arc de Triomphe, cet espace somptueux offre un mélange parfait entre le charme classique parisien et le confort moderne.

L'intérieur a été rénové avec soin pour créer un espace à la fois élégant et fonctionnel. Les hauts plafonds, les lustres en cristal et les cheminées en marbre apportent une touche de grandeur à chaque pièce. Le mobilier et les finitions sont soigneusement sélectionnés pour créer une atmosphère chaleureuse et sophistiquée.

Les chambres principales sont de véritables havres de paix, dotées de salles de bains ensuite et de placards spacieux. Les finitions luxueuses et les textiles de haute qualité ajoutent au confort.
j:translation_fr.title: Appartement au centre de Paris

j:translation_en.description:
Located in one of the most prestigious neighborhoods of Paris, this Parisian apartment epitomizes French elegance in all its glory. Nestled in the heart of the 8th arrondissement, just steps away from the Champs-lyses and the Arc de Triomphe, this splendid space offers a perfect blend of classic Parisian charm and modern comfort.

The interior has been carefully renovated to create a space that is both elegant and functional. High ceilings, crystal chandeliers, and marble fireplaces add a touch of grandeur to every room. The furniture and finishes are carefully selected to create a warm and sophisticated atmosphere.

The master bedrooms are true havens of peace, featuring ensuite bathrooms and spacious closets. Luxurious finishes and high-quality textiles add to the comfort.
j:translation_en.title: Apartment in the center of Paris

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette imposante maison de maître incarne le raffinement et le prestige, au sein même de la ville. Avec son architecture élégante et ses façades majestueuses, cette résidence offre un cadre de vie luxueux et prestigieux, idéalement situé à proximité des commodités et des attractions de la ville.

L'intérieur de la maison respire le charme et l'authenticité, avec ses hauts plafonds, ses moulures décoratives et ses parquets anciens. Les vastes espaces de réception offrent un cadre idéal pour recevoir famille et amis dans un confort absolu, tandis que les chambres spacieuses offrent un havre de paix pour se retirer en toute tranquillité.
La maison de maître dispose également d'un jardin privé, véritable oasis de verdure en plein cœur de la ville. Avec ses terrasses ombragées et ses parterres fleuris, cet espace extérieur offre une échappée paisible et relaxante loin de l'agitation urbaine.
j:translation_fr.title: Maison au cur de la ville Bourgogne

j:translation_en.description:
This imposing mansion embodies refinement and prestige right in the heart of the city. With its elegant architecture and majestic facades, this residence offers a luxurious and prestigious living environment, ideally located close to the city's amenities and attractions.

The interior of the house exudes charm and authenticity, with its high ceilings, decorative moldings, and antique parquet floors. The spacious reception areas provide an ideal setting for entertaining family and friends in absolute comfort, while the ample bedrooms offer a peaceful haven for quiet retreat.

In addition to its interior elegance, the mansion also boasts a private garden, a true green oasis in the heart of the city. With its shaded terraces and flower beds, this outdoor space offers a peaceful and relaxing escape from urban hustle and bustle.
j:translation_en.title: City House

j:translation_fr.description:
Une résidence d'exception qui allie luxe et nature dans un équilibre parfait. Ce domaine offre une expérience de vie unique, où l'élégance historique rencontre la tranquillité verdoyante. Avec ses vastes étendues de verdure, ses arbres centenaires et ses jardins paysagers, ce parc est un véritable havre de paix, offrant une évasion bienvenue de l'agitation du monde moderne.

La propriété elle-même est un chef-d'œuvre architectural avec ses dépendances historiques. Les intérieurs sont à la fois somptueux et accueillants, avec des espaces de réception spacieux, des chambres luxueuses et des finitions haut de gamme. Les grandes fenêtres offrent une vue imprenable sur le parc environnant, créant une connexion harmonieuse entre l'intérieur et l'extérieur.
j:translation_fr.title: Domaine majestueux proche Deauville

j:translation_en.description:
An exceptional residence that seamlessly combines luxury and nature in perfect harmony. This estate offers a unique living experience, where historical elegance meets lush tranquility. With vast expanses of greenery, century-old trees, and landscaped gardens, this park is a true sanctuary, providing a welcome escape from the hustle and bustle of the modern world.

The property itself is an architectural masterpiece with its historic outbuildings. The interiors are both sumptuous and welcoming, with spacious reception areas, luxurious bedrooms, and high-end finishes. Large windows offer stunning views of the surrounding park, creating a harmonious connection between indoors and outdoors.
j:translation_en.title: Majectic estate

j:translation_fr.description: Cette grande maison offre une retraite paisible au cœur de la campagne, où le charme rustique rencontre le confort moderne. Cette grande maison champêtre est nichée au milieu de vastes étendues de verdure, offrant un cadre serein et enchanteur pour échapper à l'agitation de la vie urbaine. Avec ses jardins luxuriants, cette propriété est un véritable havre de paix, idéal pour ceux qui recherchent la tranquillité et la beauté de la nature.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa champtre Normandie

j:translation_en.description: This spacious house provides a peaceful retreat in the heart of the countryside, where rustic charm meets modern comfort. Nestled amidst expansive greenery, this large countryside home offers a serene and enchanting setting to escape the hustle and bustle of urban life. With its lush gardens, this property is a true sanctuary, perfect for those seeking the tranquility and beauty of nature.
j:translation_en.title: Countryside villa

j:translation_fr.description:
Ce magnifique domaine, étendu sur plusieurs hectares de jardins impeccables, offre une expérience de vie incomparable. Des parterres de fleurs envoûtants aux allées ombragées, chaque recoin de ce domaine enchanteur raconte une histoire d'amour avec la nature.

Les vastes salons ornés de lustres scintillants et de cheminées en marbre offrent un cadre idéal pour les réceptions grandioses, tandis que les chambres somptueuses, chacune avec sa propre salle de bain en marbre, offrent un confort et une intimité absolue. Les fenêtres surdimensionnées inondent les espaces de lumière naturelle et offrent des vues imprenables sur les jardins en fleurs.

Les cinq chambres spacieuses, chacune avec sa propre salle de bain, offrent un confort luxueux et une intimité totale pour les résidents et les invités.
j:translation_fr.title: Manoir historique Sologne

j:translation_en.description:
This magnificent estate, sprawling across several hectares of immaculate gardens, offers an unparalleled living experience. From enchanting flower beds to shaded pathways, every corner of this charming estate tells a love story with nature.

The expansive salons adorned with sparkling chandeliers and marble fireplaces provide an ideal setting for grand receptions, while the sumptuous bedrooms, each with its own marble bathroom, offer ultimate comfort and privacy. Oversized windows flood the spaces with natural light and offer breathtaking views of the blooming gardens.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, provide luxurious comfort and complete privacy for residents and guests.
j:translation_en.title: Historic manor

j:translation_en.description:
BONNIEUX
LUXURY PROPERTY WITH PANORAMIC VIEW
In the shade of a century-old plane tree, this superb residence was rebuilt on the basis of an old winegrower's farmhouse with its refrigerated barn for grapes, completely reorganized and decorated.
It is located between BONNIEUX and ROUSSILLON in the heart of a wine estate and an olive grove, the land area is 13.25 hectares, including 7.8 hectares in one piece around the building. The usable surface area of the Bastide is approximately 280 sqm, in a dominant position with a superb view of the Luberon, the villages of Bonnieux and Lacoste and the surrounding hills. On the ground floor you enter a large entrance hall then a living space of about 100 sqm open kitchen living room with fireplace dining room with numerous bay windows that provide access to the terraces, a cloakroom, toilets, an office, a laundry room and a technical room. On the first floor: a TV lounge library, a master suite with its bathroom, three other suites with their shower room, one with access to a large terrace and one with a balcony. The exterior facilities are superb, large stone terraces including a covered one, a heated swimming pool measuring 11.00 meters x 4.50 meters with an electric cover. A parking lot for parking many vehicles. The magnificent landscaped and wooded garden is lawned and planted with olive trees and Mediterranean species. The iron gate is automated, it rests on pillars in cut stone. Exterior lighting has been installed throughout the landscaped perimeter. The interior fittings are of high quality, underfloor heating and cooling on the ground floor, and reversible air conditioning by heat pump in ducted, stone floors, beautiful stone frames, etc. An alarm system in connection with a remote monitoring center secures this complex. The construction was carried out according to RT 2012 standards, it benefits from ten-year guarantees. This house is sold fully furnished and equipped with dishes, linens, all electrical appliances, so that the lucky buyer only has to bring his personal effects to settle in and enjoy it. This object is rare for sale.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury House for sale in Bonnieux, France - 130685201

j:translation_en.description:
Located in one of the most sought-after areas of St Paul de Vence, this magnificent south-facing property enjoys a breathtaking view of the sea stretching from Cap Ferrat to Cap d'Antibes, with the emblematic medieval village of St Paul de Vence in the foreground.
Its luxury renovation, completed in January 2024, makes it an exceptional property.
Built over 3 levels, this neo-Provenal property, adorned with dressed stone and fully air-conditioned, boasts over 300 sqm of spacious living space. The ground floor comprises a vast entrance hall opening onto a double living room, bathed in light thanks to its large picture windows, offering a view of the sea and the village and opening onto 2 adjoining south-facing terraces with direct access to the swimming pool. A beautiful open-plan kitchen with wine cellar, a utility room, a bedroom with en suite shower room opening onto the terrace and a guest toilet complete this level.
Upstairs are 2 en suite bedrooms with dressing rooms and shower rooms, as well as a vast master bedroom which opened by a beautiful Indonesian door, with a large dressing room, en suite bathroom and deep south-facing private terrace. All rooms benefit from exceptional views.
The garden level has an independent studio, linked to the ground floor by an internal staircase.
The 2180 sqm garden, planted with Mediterranean and fruit trees, has a lovely swimming pool, multisport court, a garage for 2 cars and plenty of parking spots.
A 5-minute walk from the village, 15 minutes from Nice airport. Close to shops, schools and transport links.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa for sale in Saint-Paul-de-Vence, France - 130429981

j:translation_en.description:
Ideally positioned between the medieval village of Grimaud and the pristine beaches of the Gulf of Saint-Tropez, this exceptional Provenal estate seamlessly blends timeless authenticity with refined contemporary comforts.
This beautifully restored 18th-century stone bastide offers approximately 400 m of elegant living space. The interiors are enhanced by exposed beams, a majestic fireplace, and generous volumes flooded with natural light. The main residence features two luminous reception rooms, a stylish bar area, an open-plan kitchen with central island, and a welcoming dining roomperfectly suited for both intimate gatherings and grand entertaining. Four spacious en-suite bedrooms, a mezzanine office, a laundry room, underfloor heating, and reversible air conditioning ensure year-round comfort.
Recently repainted throughoutincluding all shuttersthe home also boasts a charming terrace ideal for al fresco living. Two fully independent guest apartments offer additional accommodation, each comprising a bedroom, kitchen, bathroom, and dressing spaceideal for hosting friends or generating rental income.
Set within 2,840 m of meticulously landscaped gardens, the property features a stunning 12 x 5 meter swimming pool, a large pool house, a private well, and an electric gated entrance. This turnkey residence presents a rare opportunity to acquire a truly unique property in one of the Cte dAzurs most sought-after locations.
j:translation_en.title: 10 room luxury Villa for sale in Grimaud, France - 131508320

j:translation_en.description:
Beautiful property located in Beaulieu sur Mer, in the heart of the French Riviera, within an elegant early 20th-century villa equipped with an elevator and refined common areas. The charming property consists of an apartment of about 90 sqm (about 120 sqm gross) situated on the top floor, featuring a small panoramic balcony with breathtaking views from Saint Jean Cap Ferrat to Cap dAil. The charming apartment is composed of a large entrance with a sofa bed, a living room with a balcony, a kitchen, a master suite with an en-suite bathroom, little bedroom and a toilet. The property also includes a covered parking space and a cellar. Villa Vanna, with its large terrace overlooking the harbor and the gulf, is just a short walk from the town center, which can also be reached via a convenient pedestrian path. The communal garden offers picturesque scenery at every corner.
All data and information contained in this document have been provided by the seller / owner and must be considered as purely indicative without being considered as a contractual condition.

j:translation_en.description:
BONNIEUX and LOURMARIN 10 minutes away
In a first-class environment and very protected nature in the heart of the Luberon Regional Nature Park.
This 19th century Mansion has been completely restored.
Its useful surface area is approximately 330 sqm including:
On the ground floor: A living space, lounge, dining room, open kitchen equipped with a fireplace, a laundry room, a technical room and storage room, a toilet
On the 1st floor: a large hallway, two suites with their shower room, one of them with its dressing room, three other bedrooms, a bathroom
On the 2nd floor: a large TV lounge room and dormitory bedroom, a shower room
Outside: a summer kitchen, a shed, a heated salt water swimming pool measuring 12 meters x 3.50 meters, a bowling green, a large parking
The main facade facing south benefits from a large terrace shaded by a superb trellis
The rooms have high ceilings and very beautiful volumes, the house is bathed in light. This residence has been perfectly renovated, the nice old features have been preserved, a fair balance between the old and the contemporary in order to make it very comfortable and pleasant to live in.
The surface area of the property is 2.08 ha in a park with oak trees, meadows and wooded areas.
It is bordered by a small river, the Aiguebrun, with a natural waterfall and enjoys a beautiful view of the surrounding mountains. The Aiguebrun valley and the Buoux cliffs offer exceptional sites in the Luberon: landscapes, vegetation and evidence of ancient times make it a privileged place in the massif and a internationally renowned climbing site.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Farmhouse for sale in Bonnieux, Provence-Alpes-Cte d'Azur - 130958265

j:translation_en.description: Nouvelle Vague is new development of luxury apartments from 1 to 3 bedrooms with a rooftop pool with solarium and sea views close to Antibes old town and the beach. A number of the top floor apartments benefit from large private roof terraces and some apartments have sea views from both inside and outside the apartment. There are also private and shared gardens which will be filled with Mediterranean vegetation that will include olive, plum and oak trees among others alongside many shrubs and flowers to create a really delightful environment around the residence. Fiber optic internet, underground parking and bike storage is included along with private storage rooms while the heating and cooling systems within each apartment is by air heat pump. Use this as your main or second home or if you wish you can sign a rental mandate with Avecoeur who provide quasi hotel services and concierge for short term bookings. If you sign this mandate and rent your apartment out for at least a few weeks each year you will benefit from receiving back all the VAT included in your purchase price (20%) but also of course the rental income received less the commission. Avecoeur, in addition to property managers are also developers, interior designers and mortgage brokers, making the group a unique one stop shop for property investors in France. Antibes Nouvelle Vague is located a 10 min walk to the beach and a 25 min walk to the old center of Antibes. with its great selection of shops, bars, cafes, restaurants etc, however there is a smaller selection of shops and restaurants just a 5 min walk away. Within just a 4 min walk you have a bakery while a supermarket is 10 mins walk and the Tennis and Padel club is just a 15 min walk away. Antibes is one of the most famous and sought after seaside towns on the Cte d'Azur with its charming stone-built center with Picasso & Peynet museums, a theater, weekly markets and its four marinas which welcome some of the world's most magnificent yachts. There are 5 golf clubs in Biot and Antibes and within 90 mins you can be in on the ski slopes of the southern Alps in Isola 2000.
j:translation_en.title: 4 room luxury Apartment for sale in 195 chemin du petit four, Antibes, Alpes-Maritimes, Provence-Alpes-Cte d'Azur - 131072475

j:translation_en.description:
Discover this charming 18th-century estate, formerly owned by Queen Jeanne, which underwent a complete renovation in 2018, combining the elegance of yesteryears with high-quality contemporary amenities. Located in a sought-after residential area, this exceptional property sits on a 1-hectare plot, mostly flat and beautifully landscaped.
The main building features five spacious bedrooms, offering comfort and privacy. There is also an independent guest house, perfect for hosting visitors, as well as a caretaker's accommodation for added security and peace of mind.
The extensive pool-house, complete with a summer kitchen and a covered terrace with a fireplace, overlooks a magnificent 19 x 7 meter heated swimming pool, ideal for relaxation or hosting outdoor events. The rose garden adds a touch of romance to this enchanting setting.
For your convenience, a double garage and ample parking spaces are available. Additionally, a tennis court allows for friendly sports activities.
Ideally located just 20 minutes from Nice International Airport, this residence blends the tranquility of a residential setting with close proximity to amenities. Do not miss the opportunity to acquire this exceptional property, where charm and modernity harmoniously come together. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (null)
j:translation_en.title: 9 room luxury Villa for sale in Vence, French Riviera - 131053501

j:translation_en.description:
Located in the renowned Domaine de Pimeau on the heights of Antibes, this contemporary property offers a luxurious living environment with a total living area of 562 m2.
The main house, covering 511 m2, features six en-suite bedrooms, , providing optimal comfort. Additionally, two independent apartments each of 25m2 on the property add two more bedrooms, bringing the total to eight bedrooms.
Set on a flat plot of 4,369 m2, the property boasts a stunning panoramic sea view of the Mediterranean. A large pool, perfectly integrated into the surroundings, offers a space for relaxation and enjoyment of this idyllic setting.
For practical needs, the property includes a carport accommodating up to five vehicles, along with a garage providing two additional parking spaces.
This residence, situated in an exclusive area, combines elegance, comfort, and luxury, while still being close to the amenities and local attractions of Antibes.

j:translation_en.description: Discover Grand crin Chtel, a PRESTIGIOUS ALPINE residence in Haute-Savoie. With ELEGANT ARCHITECTURE, PREMIUM AMENITIES, and ski-in/ski-out access to LES PORTES DE SOLEIL, it offers 49 REFINED apartments for unforgettable mountain stays. Grand crin Chtel: A Peak of Refinement in Haute-Savoie Located at the gateway to the charming village of Chtel, Grand crin Chtel is a prestigious alpine residence offering unparalleled comfort and style. Nestled in the iconic Les Portes du Soleil ski domain, this residence combines authentic Savoyard architecture with modern luxury. Its design features wooden facades, natural stone accents, and sloped roofs that harmoniously blend with the surrounding Alpine environment. Grand crin Chtel includes 49 exquisitely crafted apartments, ranging from 2 to 7 rooms. Each unit is fully furnished and decorated with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring a blend of tradition and contemporary comfort. Select apartments feature fireplaces, adding to the cozy, luxurious ambiance. The residence is enriched with premium facilities, including a heated indoor pool, spa, hammam, and sauna, ensuring relaxation after exhilarating days on the slopes. Chtel: A Year-Round Alpine Gem Chtel is a picturesque village and a gateway to Les Portes du Soleil, a vast ski area boasting over 600 km of trails across 12 interconnected resorts in France and Switzerland. During the winter months, the village offers world-class skiing, snowboarding, and winter sports. In the summer, Chtel transforms into a haven for hikers, mountain bikers, and nature enthusiasts, with lush landscapes and breathtaking vistas. The village itself charms visitors with its traditional chalets, lively center, and renowned Savoyard cuisine. Easily accessible from Geneva (1.5 hours), Chtel attracts an international clientele seeking memorable experiences in the Alps. Why Choose Sogeprom and CGH? Sogeprom - Group Socit Gnrale, a leader in sustainable development, ensures that every project respects environmental standards while prioritizing quality and innovation. With a strong commitment to eco-conscious building practices and the integration of green spaces, Sogeprom creates homes that are both elegant and environmentally responsible. Partnering with CGH Rsidences & Spas, renowned for managing 5-star residences, Grand crin Chtel offers exceptional rental management and personalized services. CGH's des Cimes spas provide luxurious wellness experiences, while their concierge services ensure that every stay is effortless and indulgent. Investing in Grand crin Chtel means choosing an exclusive lifestyle, a worry-free rental opportunity, and a secure asset in one of the most sought-after alpine locations. Whether for personal enjoyment or as a long-term investment, this residence is the ultimate choice for a premium mountain retreat.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Apartment for sale in 1083 route de Thonon, Chtel, Haute-Savoie, Auvergne-Rhne-Alpes - 131083829

j:translation_en.description:
In a confidential, peaceful environment and close to a fine sandy beach, this villa built in 2023 enjoys an unobstructed view of the blue expanse of the sea, bordered by the green hills of the beautiful domains of Cavalaire-sur-Mer.
Facing East-Southeast, this high-end villa with an area of approximately 240m2 offers bright and spacious volumes, including a large high-ceiling living room with ducted air conditioning, open to the outside through large aluminum windows and a fully equipped American kitchen.
The sleeping area consists of 5 bedrooms, including 1 on the ground floor with a dressing room and shower room, 1 large master bedroom with shower room, balneo bath and storage, 2 other suites with private dressing rooms on the garden level, and 1 additional bedroom that can be converted into a cinema room. An equipped and air-conditioned gym, a laundry room and a storage room complete the set.
Beautiful and large terraces extend to a heated overflow pool of 12x5 surrounded by magnificent palm trees, olive trees and other fruit trees. A roof terrace with a private jacuzzi dominates the surroundings, offering a magnificent panoramic view.
A true paradise of 1600m2 in a delicately landscaped garden in the charm of the Mediterranean, at the gates of Saint-Tropez.
Decennial guarantees, remote home automation system, watering and outdoor lighting, sewage system, electric charging station, petanque court, retention pond.
j:translation_en.title: 9 room luxury Villa for sale in Cavalaire-sur-Mer, French Riviera - 129593370

j:translation_en.description:
Located in the heart of 3,500 sqm of land with a swimming pool, this charming, completely renovated villa offers generous volumes with 430sqm as well as large openings allowing the warm and enveloping rays of the sun to penetrate.
This superb family property has a beautiful living space including a majestic and bright cathedral living room with fireplace, a relaxation area to enjoy the serenity of the place, as well as a large open kitchen with dining room. On the garden level, a sumptuous master bedroom with its large dressing room and bathroom has been designed. In order to make the property a place of conviviality, you will find 4 other bedrooms that are just as comfortable and bright, each also enjoying a view of a beautiful green setting.
This villa presents a Provencal identity enhanced by the choice of materials bringing to the architectural authenticity of our beautiful Cote d'Azur, an undeniable touch of elegance and modernity through its contemporary style. Ideally located close to amenities, international schools, golf courses and the international airport, this Mouginoise property is only 15 minutes from the fine sandy beaches of Cannes, providing exceptional living comfort for its occupants.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa for sale in Mougins, French Riviera - 129367144

j:translation_en.description:
Luxuary villa located Le Val de Mougins sea views
This stunning architect-designed villa in Mougins offers breathtaking sea views and embodies a refined Californian-inspired style with clean lines and contemporary design throughout. The elegant construction combines lime-painted concrete masonry with natural stone cladding, creating an enduring and sophisticated aesthetic. Soaring ceilings add an extra sense of grandeur to the expansive living spaces.
On the ground floor, a majestic entrance hall welcomes you and features a striking double-flight staircase leading to the upper level. The bright and spacious double living room opens onto a covered terrace, perfect for enjoying the views. A study and a cosy family area extend onto a second terrace with a summer lounge and an ornamental pond, creating an inviting atmosphere for relaxation. A hallway leads to a guest WC, cloakroom, a fully equipped kitchen with a pantry, a dining room and a covered terrace fitted with an outdoor dining area, ideal for entertaining.
The first floor is accessed via a large landing which opens onto a lounge area and three well-appointed bedrooms. Bedrooms two and three each feature their own en-suite shower rooms with double sinks, while bedroom four has a private shower room with double sinks, WC and a west-facing terrace. The master suite is a luxurious retreat, comprising a bedroom that opens onto a covered terrace, a private lounge overlooking the garden, a spacious walk-in dressing room and a full bathroom complete with a bathtub, shower, double sink and two separate WCs.
The lower garden level, accessible via an external staircase from the ground floor, offers three additional bedrooms, each with its own bathroom or shower room, double sinks and WC. This level also includes a stylish pool house with a dining area and fully equipped kitchen that opens onto a large terrace. The wellness area provides a gym, two guest WCs, two massage rooms, a hammam, a sauna, a sensory shower, a changing room and an additional WC, ensuring every comfort for relaxation and rejuvenation.
Further features include air conditioning, double flow ventilation, double glazing, an engine generator, fireplace, sliding windows, fencing, an irrigation sprinkler system, outdoor lighting and a caretakers house, offering a complete and luxurious lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa for sale in Mougins, French Riviera - 131612832

j:translation_en.description:
Near Monaco Nestled in Roquebrune's historic landscape, Auriva represents the last vestige of the Grimaldi family's ancient olive groves, a true heritage that honors their legacy.
This exquisite estate is home to around 100 carefully tended olive trees, each contributing to the rich heritage and exceptional quality. This absolutely tranquil property offers breathtaking views over the bay of Menton, the Italian coast, Cap Martin and Monaco. The grounds comprise almost 7,000 m and an existing 379 m Provencal villa with 5 bedrooms, 3 bathrooms, 2 shower rooms, a studio/workshop and a sauna. A separate building serves as an office or annex for employees.
Possibility of extending the existing villa with a corresponding project, architectural plans are already available and can be communicated after a visit. There is also the possibility of a second villa on the estate. A total of 1300 m2 can be built on the property.
To complete this property, there is a well and water rights and a large vegetable garden with a number of different citrus fruits. Auriva olive oil has deep roots in the Principality of Monaco, dating back to the 14th century.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa for sale in Roquebrune-Cap-Martin, French Riviera - 129501258

j:translation_en.description: This fully renovated 200 sqm house offers four bedrooms and three bathrooms, providing a perfect blend of comfort and elegance. The ground floor welcomes you with a spacious open-plan kitchen that extends to a covered terrace, ideal for al fresco dining. The south-facing living room, complete with a fireplace, offers stunning views of the Pyrenees and the garden. This level also includes a bedroom, a bathroom, and a dressing room. Descending to the garden level, you will discover a generous master suite with an en-suite bathroom, two additional bedrooms with a shared bathroom, a laundry room, and a gym. The interior spaces can be customized to your taste, allowing you to create your ideal living environment. The renovated 120 sqm annex features an open-plan kitchen leading to a bright living room with a wood-burning stove, opening onto a terrace with breathtaking views of the Pyrenees. The north side of this annex includes a guest bedroom with an en-suite shower and a master suite with a large dressing room and a walk-in shower. The master suite opens onto a private terrace with a jacuzzi and sauna. Adjacent to the annex, a 45 sqm guest house offers a living room/office, a kitchen, a bedroom, and a shower room. Both the annex and the guest house are equipped with reversible heating and air conditioning, ensuring comfort throughout the year. The property also features a heated pool, a barbecue area, and a fire pit, perfect for entertaining and relaxation. Additionally, there is a 65 sqm garage and extra parking spaces available. Located in a tranquil environment, this property is just a short walk from shops and restaurants, and only a 5-minute drive from the golf course and the beach. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (2024-07-11)

j:translation_en.description:
Luxuary villa located in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat
Just a few steps from the legendary Four Seasons Grand Hotel in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat lies a magnificent pieds dans leau residence, a true jewel of the Riviera offering nearly 700 square metres of refined living space directly along the waters edge. This extraordinary villa, spread across three elegant levels, commands mesmerising sea views from every room, promising a lifestyle of rare serenity and privilege in one of the most coveted locations along the French coast.
The main house opens into a grand reception room, bathed in natural light and designed to flow seamlessly onto an expansive 80-square-metre terrace. This outdoor haven is complete with a fully equipped summer kitchen, a wine cellar, and a stylish lounge area with integrated televisionperfectly conceived for entertaining in style while overlooking the ever-changing blues of the Mediterranean.
The sleeping quarters are arranged with equal consideration to comfort and privacy, comprising five luxurious en suite bedrooms. At the pinnacle of the home, the master suite crowns the villa with commanding views, elegant proportions, and indulgent amenities, creating a personal sanctuary of the highest order.
For visiting guests, a separate 75-square-metre apartment offers a discreet yet luxurious retreat. Finished to exacting standards, it enjoys private access to its own outdoor space and a seamless connection to the pool area, ensuring both comfort and exclusivity.
The villas orientation is one of its most striking features, offering sweeping sea views from every aspect of the home, infusing each moment with a sense of calm and timeless beauty. The vast pool terrace, designed not merely as a leisure space but as an extension of the home itself, is centred around a 60-square-metre pool house. Within, a hammam and sauna provide a private spa-like experience, while a grand stone staircase descends directly to the coastal path and the sea, where tranquil walks and ocean dips await those drawn to the waters edge.
Landscaped gardens, meticulously designed and maintained, envelop the property in greenery, enhancing its sense of seclusion and elegance. In addition, two independent staff studios are discreetly positioned near the entrance to ensure privacy and optimal day-to-day assistance. A secure double garage and further outdoor parking complete this exceptional estate.
Combining architectural distinction with an extraordinary setting, this waterfront villa is a rare offeringan expression of refined Mediterranean living at its most sophisticated, in the timeless embrace of Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat.
j:translation_en.title: 9 room luxury Villa for sale in Saint-Jean-Cap-Ferrat, France - 131547394

j:translation_en.description: Les Citronniers is a unique, boutique residence of 7 luxury 3 and 4 bedroom villas with magnificent sea views and private infinity pools. It is located a short walk to the beach and shops and is surrounded by nature and the essences of the Mediterranean seaside. Each villa comes with a garage as standard and a reversible heat pump controls the temperature inside while extra comforts such as large format tiling, electric controlled blinds and heated towel rails come as standard. Use this as your main or second home or if you wish you can sign a rental mandate with Avecoeur who provide quasi hotel services and concierge for short term bookings. If you sign this mandate and rent your apartment out for at least a few weeks each year you will benefit from receiving back all the VAT included in your purchase price (20%) but also of course the rental income received less the commission. Avecoeur, in addition to property management are also developers, interior designers and mortgage brokers, making the group a unique one stop shop for property investors in France. Rayol Canadel Sur Mer Les Citronniers is located just a 10 minute walk to the beaches where you will find a selection of restaurants and just a 15 min walk from the village center with a wider choice of restaurants, shops, bakery, mini-market and a Provencal market every Friday morning from April to September. You are also just an 11 minute drive to Cavalaire-sur-mer, 18 mins drive from Le Lavendou and 35 mins drive from St Tropez. Crossed by the pretty coastal road, on the west-east axis between Marseille and Menton, the town of Rayol-Canadel sur Mer has been part of the Community of Communes of the Gulf of Saint-Tropez since 2013. Living in Rayol means choosing to live in the heart of Provence, in a Var village which has kept all its authenticity on the shores of the Mediterranean. It's preferring calm to bustle, while remaining close to very lively cities such as Saint-Tropez, Hyres, Sainte-Maxime or Toulon. It is to share the story of a seaside resort created in 1925 and marked by strong moments for France: the village was the scene of Operation Anvil Dragoon during the landing in Provence on August 14, 1944, as several monuments recall. It is walking in the footsteps of famous personalities such as Henry Royce, co-founder of the Rolls-Royce automobile brand, Charles Sarrazin, architect who had several villas built there, Henry Potez. It is to enjoy a generous Mediterranean nature, facing the sea. Magnificently wooded with forests of cork oaks, heather and mimosas, the commune of Rayol Canadel sur Mer extends in a circle of greenery with, to the north, the Massif des Maures and, to the south, the coastal rock formed by capes, coves and magnificent bays sheltering three fine sandy beaches. The town also has a treasure: the renowned Domaine du Rayol and its Jardin des Mditerranes. A real invitation to travel through the landscapes of the Mediterranean, arid and subtropical world, this protected natural area of 20 hectares is open all year round. Facing the village and right in the middle of the big blue stretch the Levant Islands, Porquerolles Islands and the Island of Port-Cros, recognized worldwide for its National Park protected in the Natura 2000 area.
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury Villa for sale in 51 Av. Etienne Gola, 83820 Rayol-Canadel-sur-Mer, Rayol-Canadel-sur-Mer, Provence-Alpes-Cte d'Azur - 130859691

j:translation_fr.description: Les Citronniers is a unique, boutique residence of 7 luxury 3 and 4 bedroom villas with magnificent sea views and private infinity pools. It is located a short walk to the beach and shops and is surrounded by nature and the essences of the Mediterranean seaside. Each villa comes with a garage as standard and a reversible heat pump controls the temperature inside while extra comforts such as large format tiling, electric controlled blinds and heated towel rails come as standard. Use this as your main or second home or if you wish you can sign a rental mandate with Avecoeur who provide quasi hotel services and concierge for short term bookings. If you sign this mandate and rent your apartment out for at least a few weeks each year you will benefit from receiving back all the VAT included in your purchase price (20%) but also of course the rental income received less the commission. Avecoeur, in addition to property management are also developers, interior designers and mortgage brokers, making the group a unique one stop shop for property investors in France. Rayol Canadel Sur Mer Les Citronniers is located just a 10 minute walk to the beaches where you will find a selection of restaurants and just a 15 min walk from the village center with a wider choice of restaurants, shops, bakery, mini-market and a Provencal market every Friday morning from April to September. You are also just an 11 minute drive to Cavalaire-sur-mer, 18 mins drive from Le Lavendou and 35 mins drive from St Tropez. Crossed by the pretty coastal road, on the west-east axis between Marseille and Menton, the town of Rayol-Canadel sur Mer has been part of the Community of Communes of the Gulf of Saint-Tropez since 2013. Living in Rayol… means choosing to live in the heart of Provence, in a Var village which has kept all its authenticity on the shores of the Mediterranean. It's preferring calm to bustle, while remaining close to very lively cities such as Saint-Tropez, Hyères, Sainte-Maxime or Toulon. It is to share the story of a seaside resort created in 1925 and marked by strong moments for France: the village was the scene of Operation Anvil Dragoon during the landing in Provence on August 14, 1944, as several monuments recall. It is walking in the footsteps of famous personalities such as Henry Royce, co-founder of the Rolls-Royce automobile brand, Charles Sarrazin, architect who had several villas built there, Henry Potez. It is to enjoy a generous Mediterranean nature, facing the sea. Magnificently wooded with forests of cork oaks, heather and mimosas, the commune of Rayol Canadel sur Mer extends in a circle of greenery with, to the north, the Massif des Maures and, to the south, the coastal rock formed by capes, coves and magnificent bays sheltering three fine sandy beaches. The town also has a treasure: the renowned Domaine du Rayol and its Jardin des Méditerranées. A real invitation to travel through the landscapes of the Mediterranean, arid and subtropical world, this protected natural area of 20 hectares is open all year round. Facing the village and right in the middle of the big blue stretch the Levant Islands, Porquerolles Islands and the Island of Port-Cros, recognized worldwide for its National Park protected in the Natura 2000 area.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa d'exception Rayol-Canadel-sur-Mer

j:translation_en.description: FAUBOURG St HONORE - TRIPLEX WITH TERRACE Situated between the Elyse and Place Vendme, in a quiet location, this magnificent triplex apartment (147.03 m loi Carrez) has been completely renovated and is on the top floor of a building with a lift and concierge. The flat comprises a spacious lounge, dining room and kitchen, a suite with bathroom, shower, toilet and dressing room, and a second bedroom with shower room and toilet. Balconies and a large south-facing terrace of 38m. The flat is sold furnished.
j:translation_en.title: 3 room luxury penthouse for sale in Champs-Elyses, Madeleine, Triangle dor, France - 131014836

j:translation_en.description:
In a dominant position, this sumptuous residence boasts incredible sea views and an ideal setting.
Spanning over 700m2 of living space, the property has 5 bedrooms in the main house and a further 5 bedrooms in various extensions to the house, guaranteeing both comfort and privacy.
A lush, perfectly manicured garden of around 7,566m2, complete with swimming pool and tennis court, as well as numerous outdoor spaces, make this the perfect family home or holiday residence.
j:translation_en.title: 12 room luxury Villa for sale in La Colle-sur-Loup, French Riviera - 130944605

j:translation_en.description:
Located on the top floor of a luxury building, discover this 200 m (186.23 m Carrez Law) duplex apartment with 100 m of terraces in a prime location in Aix-en-Provence, just steps from the prestigious Set-Club. This exceptional property offers an unparalleled living experience, combining generous volumes, sumptuous amenities (interior elevator), and magnificent exteriors.
A private interior elevator serves the various levels, ensuring comfort and privacy. The apartment consists of three magnificent suites, each with its own terrace, inviting you to relax outdoors. The master suite is a true haven of peace: it includes a custom-made dressing room, an elegant freestanding bathtub, and an en-suite bathroom, offering a space of absolute well-being.
The majestic living room is the heart of this exceptional apartment. Bathed in light thanks to large windows, it opens onto a 75 m terrace offering unobstructed views of the surrounding nature. Accessible via a magnificent glass staircase, the mezzanine offers a spacious office and a dressing room.
This veritable green oasis on high ground is the ideal place to entertain or enjoy moments of tranquility with unobstructed views.
This unique property also features a triple garage and a cellar, valuable assets for optimal living comfort. Contact us today to discover this gem of Aix real estate.
This property is subject to the status of co-ownership - co-ownership of 82 lots - no proceedings in progress. Annual charges approximately 2500
j:translation_en.title: 3 bedroom luxury Flat for sale in Aix-en-Provence, France - 131612565

j:translation_en.description:
Located in a sought-after residential area just 5 minutes from Villefranche-sur-Mer, this modern villa enjoys a peaceful and privileged setting with breathtaking views over the sea and Cap Ferrat.
With its sleek design, the property combines elegance and comfort, featuring high-end materials such as Carrara marble and Lualdi doors. Bathed in natural light through expansive floor-to-ceiling windows, the villa offers a refined and welcoming ambiance.
Spread over two levels, it includes a spacious double living room facing the sea, an independent designer kitchen by Gaggenau with dining area, and three bedrooms, including a stunning master suite with a Poliform walk-in closet and en-suite bathroom, all opening onto a loggia.
A separate guest house with direct access to the pool offers a living room with kitchen, one bedroom, a built-in wardrobe, and a bathroom with toilet.
Luxury amenities also include a wellness area with hammam, sauna, and shower, a laundry room, wine cellar, large garage, landscaped garden, a 15-meter heated pool, and an elegant pool house. At the back of the garden, a beautiful area with fruit trees: apricots, cherries, almonds, lemon, plum, and figs. The entire property is under 24/7 video surveillance.
j:translation_en.title: 6 room luxury Villa for sale in Nice, French Riviera - 131390640

j:translation_en.description: Sole Agent Mandate - Built in 1969 by renowned architect Franois SPOERRY as his personal home, this exceptional building offers one of the largest private water frontages (100m) on the Cte d'Azur, and an unique boathouse with direct access to the library. In the heart of Port-Grimaud, an ultra-secure estate 365 days a year, this property is at the end of a cul-de-sac surrounded by water on 3 sides. It offers around 600 sqmof living space, including a main villa, a caretaker's apartment and a guest apartment. The complex offers 8 suites with bathrooms, 3 kitchens, a dining room, 3 living rooms, a library, a laundry level, a workshop, 2 outdoor swimming pools, a garage and an unique boathouse. The interior volumes are exceptional, with ceiling heights of up to 4.28 metres in the living room and 3.93 metres under the vaulted ceiling of the bedrooms. It's ideal location means you can reach the heart of the port of Saint-Tropez or the beach at Pampelonne in just a few minutes by sea.
j:translation_en.title: 18 room luxury House for sale in Saint-Tropez, French Riviera - 130921000

j:translation_fr.description: Sole Agent Mandate - Built in 1969 by renowned architect François SPOERRY as his personal home, this exceptional building offers one of the largest private water frontages (100m) on the Côte d'Azur, and an unique boathouse with direct access to the library.   In the heart of Port-Grimaud, an ultra-secure estate 365 days a year, this property is at the end of a cul-de-sac surrounded by water on 3 sides.  It offers around 600 sqm of living space, including a main villa, a caretaker's apartment and a guest apartment. j:translation_en.description:
Beautiful villa located in Saint-Paul-de-Vence
In one of the most coveted private estates of the Cte dAzur, this exceptional Provenal bastide, designed by the esteemed architect Giselbach, is a true masterpiece nestled within landscaped grounds of approximately 1.3 hectares. Embraced by sweeping panoramic views of the sea, rolling countryside.
The main residence is both grand and graceful, offering generous living spaces that unfold harmoniously across five elegant bedrooms, a refined study, and both indoor and outdoor kitchen designed for effortless entertaining and quiet moments alike. Every room exudes a sense of timeless sophistication, thoughtfully designed to draw in the natural beauty that surrounds it.
A charming guest house sits nearby, welcoming family and visitors with three inviting bedrooms and an atmosphere of understated luxury. For additional convenience, a fully independent caretakers apartment adds further versatility to this remarkable estate, bringing the total living space to around 730 square metres.
The grounds are a haven of serenity, dotted with shaded terraces, a large swimming pool, and a private tennis court for leisurely afternoons. Carports and ample parking offer practicality without compromising the natural beauty of the setting. There is also an exciting opportunity to extend the estate by approximately 1,000 square metres, allowing space for further development such as a spa, gym, additional garages, or a new residenceoffering a rare level of flexibility for future aspirations.
With a discreet yet comprehensive range of modern amenities including security systems, electric gates, outdoor lighting, and irrigation, the estate combines luxury.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Villa for sale in Saint-Paul-de-Vence, French Riviera - 131566312

j:translation_fr.description: Beautiful villa located in Saint-Paul-de-Vence In one of the most coveted private estates of the Côte d’Azur, this exceptional Provençal bastide, designed by the esteemed architect Giselbach, is a true masterpiece nestled within landscaped grounds of approximately 1.3 hectares. j:translation_en.description: At the hamlet of La Boucherie in the Valle de la Manche area of Morzine, an area known for its beautiful mountain scenery, popular with ski touring enthusiasts in winter and walkers in summer. There is a well known off-piste itinerary that descends from the Fornet lift at 2225m down to the Erign bus stop at 1186m. The free ski bus runs up and down the valley from the centre of Morzine. The Nyon ski lift is 750m away and gives easy access to the Morzine/Les Gets ski area. In winter the riverside path is a nordic skiing piste and in summer a beautiful walking area that includes the impressive Nyon waterfall. The chalet is situated just 2km from the mayors office in the centre of Morzine. With new windows and doors through out, plus a recently refurbished roof, the chalet has 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, two of which are ensuite. An attractive living area and kitchen/diner open out on to a balcony terrace with excellent views and steps that descend to a garden. There is another terrace to the side of the house that would be perfect for a hot tub or exterior sauna. Exterior steps go down to a spacious double garage and large cellar for storage, while there are two cellars under the house, one for storage and another housing the fuel central heating system. There are also two exterior parking spaces at road level. Annee Reference DPE: 2021 Presence Georisques: Non
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury House for sale in Morzine, Auvergne-Rhne-Alpes - 130987453

j:translation_fr.description: At the hamlet of La Boucherie in the Vallée de la Manche area of Morzine, an area known for its beautiful mountain scenery, popular with ski touring enthusiasts in winter and walkers in summer. There is a well known off-piste itinerary that descends from the Fornet lift at 2225m down to the Erigné bus stop at 1186m. The free ski bus runs up and down the valley from the centre of Morzine. The Nyon ski lift is 750m away and gives easy access to the Morzine/Les Gets ski area. In winter the riverside path is a nordic skiing piste and in summer a beautiful walking area that includes the impressive Nyon waterfall. The chalet is situated just 2km from the mayors office in the centre of Morzine. With new windows and doors through out, plus a recently refurbished roof, the chalet has 5 bedrooms and 3 bathrooms, two of which are ensuite.
