There are also two exterior parking spaces at road level. Annee Reference DPE: 2021 Presence Georisques: Non
j:translation_fr.title: Chalet 7 pices Morzine

j:translation_en.description: Une propriété rare, au cœur d’un écrin préservé pour passionnés de golf et d’art de vivre Située en bordure directe du prestigieux parcours du Golf de Sperone – considéré comme l’un des plus beaux au monde – cette villa bénéficie d’un emplacement absolument unique. Ce parcours d’exception attire chaque année une clientèle internationale exigeante : golfeurs passionnés, investisseurs et chefs d’entreprise. Cet environnement privilégié favorise naturellement les échanges entre connaisseurs, dans un cadre où se conjuguent élégance, discrétion et art de vivre à la corse. À l’abri des regards, la propriété se transforme en un véritable cocon, intime et préservé, parfait pour se ressourcer ou entretenir un réseau de qualité. Magnifique propriété   d'architecte unique à Bonifacio sur Golf de Spérone Corse  Vue Mer sur la Sardaigne, plages privées, jardin méditerranéen.  Une Villa d'Exception dans un Cadre Idéale Au bout d'une voie d'accès unique, cette villa d'architecte est nichée dans un écrin de verdure méditerranéenne, offrant une tranquillité totale et une intimité préservée.  Elle est située au cœur du prestigieux domaine du Golf de Sperone, à Bonifacio, en Corse-du-Sud. Conçue par Guy Breton, un architecte de renom connu pour ses réalisations exceptionnelles, cette villa incarne l'harmonie entre l'architecture moderne et la nature environnante.  La Géographie Unique du Domaine de Sperone Le Domaine du Golf de Sperone bénéficie d’un emplacement incomparable, sur un éperon rocheux dominant le Golfe de Sperone, avec une vue imprenable sur la mer Méditerranée et la Sardaigne. À quelques pas de la propriété, une plage quasi privée vous permet de profiter d'un accès privilégié à l'eau cristalline, tandis que les îles Lavezzi, réserve naturelle, émergent majestueusement de l'horizon.  Cet emplacement rare fait de cette propriété un véritable bijou sur la côte sud de la Corse.  Le golf, signé par le célèbre architecte Trent Jones Jr., est l’un des plus beaux parcours au monde, offrant une expérience unique pour les passionnés de golf.  Offrant ainsi de larges espaces extérieurs et une vue magnifique sur la mer. Depuis les terrasses et les espaces de vie, vous pourrez profiter d’une vue dégagée sur le Golfe de Sperone, la Sardaigne et les îles Lavezzi, offrant une expérience visuelle inégalée. L'Architecture de la Propriété  , signée Guy Breton, repose sur une structure en béton renforcée par un bardage en ''Red Cedar Premium Knotty'', un bois exotique réputé pour sa durabilité et sa beauté naturelle. La villa a été conçue pour optimiser la circulation de l’air et de la lumière entre les espaces intérieurs et extérieurs. Chaque pièce s’ouvre sur des terrasses spacieuses et sur un jardin luxuriant, créant un environnement de vie harmonieux et reposant. À l'intérieur, la villa présente des matériaux nobles tels que des planchers en chêne massif, des portes persiennes et des baies vitrées coulissantes, apportant chaleur et confort.  Le concept architectural de Guy Breton, inspiré du ''GEA'' (Groupement d’Études Architecturales), intègre le bois de manière organique, respectant l’environnement naturel de la région.   Un étang avec une cascade, inspiré des jardins persans, se trouve au centre de la propriété. Il apporte une touche zen et rafraîchissante, idéale pour se détendre tout en profitant de la nature environnante.  À l’est de la villa, un petit vignoble de Cabernet-Sauvignon se mêle à l’environnement naturel. Un espace est prévu pour la construction d’une piscine, bien protégé par la végétation.  Une Villa Prête à Vivre, Aucun Gros Travaux à Prévoir Construite au début des années 90, la villa n’a nécessité aucun travaux majeurs.  En 2010, un réaménagement des terrasses et de l’intérieur a été effectué, ainsi qu’une rénovation complète de la toiture.  Le bardage en Red-Cedar, très résistant, n’a pas besoin d’être poncé ou peint et se nettoie facilement, conservant ainsi son apparence naturelle.  Détails Techniques et Espaces de Vie La villa dispose d'une surface habitable de 158 m², avec plusieurs niveaux et une conception fonctionnelle : Rez-de-chaussée : Trois chambres avec terrasses, dont deux avec salles d'eau et toilettes, un coin cuisine, et des toilettes séparées.  Premier étage : Un séjour spacieux avec une cuisine ouverte et une terrasse côté sud, une chambre avec salle d’eau et toilettes.  Deuxième étage : Une chambre avec salle de bains et toilettes, ainsi qu'une terrasse.  L’extérieur comprend également un abri sous terrasse, une cave, deux garages et un local technique.  Le chauffage au bois et l’eau chaude sanitaire sont alimentés par un système économique, et les coûts annuels d’énergie tout compris (chauffage, eau chaude sanitaire, éclairage électrique) donnés entre 2360 € et 3240 € selon le Diagnostic de performance énergétique.  Une Expérience Inoubliable à Bonifacio La villa se trouve au cœur du Domaine de Sperone, à proximité de la plage et du golf.  Avec sa vue imprenable sur la mer et la Sardaigne, son architecture unique, et son jardin méditerranéen paisible, cette propriété offre une expérience de vie inégalée.  5 chambres Jardin méditerranéen Accès direct au Golf de Sperone Plage privée à proximité Vue mer imprenable 158 m² habitables Superficie du terrain : 2530 m² (25 ares 30 centiares) Consommation énergétique annuelle : entre 2360 € et 3240 € tout compris (chauffage Superficie habitable de 158 m², est nichée sur un terrain de 25 ares 30 centiares (2530 m²) 6 Pièces 5 chambres. Prix : 3 700 000 € (commission incluse à la charge du vendeur)
j:translation_en.title: 4 bedroom luxury Villa for sale in Bonifacio, France - 131238634

l’environnement naturel de la région.   Un étang avec une cascade, inspiré des jardins persans, se trouve au centre de la propriété. Il apporte une touche zen et rafraîchissante, idéale pour se détendre tout en profitant de la nature environnante.  À l’est de la villa, un petit vignoble de Cabernet-Sauvignon se mêle à l’environnement naturel. Un espace est prévu pour la construction d’une piscine, bien protégé par la végétation.  Une Villa Prête à Vivre, Aucun Gros Travaux à Prévoir Construite au début des années 90, la villa n’a nécessité aucun travaux majeurs.  En 2010, un réaménagement des terrasses et de l’intérieur a été effectué, ainsi qu’une rénovation complète de la toiture.  Le bardage en Red-Cedar, très résistant, n’a pas besoin d’être poncé ou peint et se nettoie facilement, conservant ainsi son apparence naturelle.  Détails Techniques et Espaces de Vie La villa dispose d'une surface habitable de 158 m², avec plusieurs niveaux et une conception fonctionnelle : Rez-de-chaussée : Trois chambres avec terrasses, dont deux avec salles d'eau et toilettes, un coin cuisine, et des toilettes séparées.  Premier étage : Un séjour spacieux avec une cuisine ouverte et une terrasse côté sud, une chambre avec salle d’eau et toilettes.  Deuxième étage : Une chambre avec salle de bains et toilettes, ainsi qu'une terrasse.  L’extérieur comprend également un abri sous terrasse, une cave, deux garages et un local technique.  Le chauffage au bois et l’eau chaude sanitaire sont alimentés par un système économique, et les coûts annuels d’énergie tout compris (chauffage, eau chaude sanitaire, éclairage électrique) donnés entre 2360 € et 3240 € selon le Diagnostic de performance énergétique.  Une Expérience Inoubliable à Bonifacio La villa se trouve au cœur du Domaine de Sperone, à proximité de la plage et du golf.  Avec sa vue imprenable sur la mer et la Sardaigne, son architecture unique, et son jardin méditerranéen paisible, cette propriété offre une expérience de vie inégalée.  5 chambres Jardin méditerranéen Accès direct au Golf de Sperone Plage privée à proximité Vue mer imprenable 158 m² habitables Superficie du terrain : 2530 m² (25 ares 30 centiares) Consommation énergétique annuelle : entre 2360 € et 3240 € tout compris (chauffage Superficie habitable de 158 m², est nichée sur un terrain de 25 ares 30 centiares (2530 m²) 6 Pièces 5 chambres. Prix : 3 700 000 € (commission incluse à la charge du vendeur)
j:translation_fr.title: Corse, Bonifacio, proprit bord de golf

j:translation_en.description: Nestled in the heart of an exclusive address in Mougins in one of the most coveted areas within walking distance of the shops and close to the golf courses and beaches of Cannes, this splendid property takes place on a vast sumptuously landscaped garden on which a lake has been drawn. This 430 m2 villa offers spacious spaces, all designed to let light in throughout the day and offer a splendid perspective on the exteriors where nature has been given pride of place. The property opens onto a majestic entrance with a double height sub-ceiling revealing the contours of the swimming pool and its surroundings. The double living room with fireplace, the dining room and the kitchen feature large openings allowing the places to free themselves from the limits between nature and architecture. In addition to this property with 4 en-suite bedrooms, there is a basement with English courtyards of 300 m2 hosting an extraordinary games room, a wine cellar, offices and a garage that can accommodate four vehicles. This splendid villa with the air of Provence offers its occupants a calm and peaceful place to live, ideal for enjoying the rays of the Azur sun in an intimate atmosphere in the corner of a jacuzzi. Possibility 5th bedroom.
j:translation_en.title: 4 bedroom luxury Villa for sale in Mougins, France - 128958693

j:translation_en.description:
Exceptional duplex penthouse at 33 Croisette: an architectural masterpiece in the heart of Cannes Perched atop the prestigious 33 Croisette, this duplex penthouse embodies the ultimate expression of luxury and refinement on the Cte d'Azur. Offering spectacular volumes and double-height ceilings, this exceptional residence unveils an unrivalled living environment, where every space has been designed to sublimate natural light and the Mediterranean Sea.
From the moment you enter, the elegance of contemporary design blends with the nobility of materials to create a unique atmosphere. The first level, dedicated to reception rooms, opens onto a majestic living room with huge picture windows, offering direct access to a panoramic terrace. A top-of-the-range kitchen with state-of-the-art equipment completes this space, ideal for entertaining in an exclusive setting.
Upstairs, the private area features sumptuous suites, veritable cocoons of serenity with their marble bathrooms and bespoke dressing rooms. The master suite, a veritable masterpiece, boasts a breathtaking sea view and access to a private terrace, where the horizon seems to stretch to infinity.
Located in the heart of the Boulevard de la Croisette, just a few steps from private beaches, luxury boutiques and the Palais des Festivals, this duplex penthouse embodies an exclusive lifestyle, combining the intimacy of a private sanctuary with the hustle and bustle of Cannes.
A jewel suspended between sky and sea, an unrivalled address where luxury and prestige take on their full meaning.
* Disclaimer: the information contained in this site, including prices, photos and ownership details, is provided for information purposes only and does not constitute a formal offer or contract. All offers are subject to change without notice. We recommend that you contact us for the most up-to-date and accurate property information.
j:translation_en.title: 11 room luxury penthouse for sale in Cannes, French Riviera - 131351714

j:translation_en.description:
Serenity is an intimate residence of just ten one to three bedroom apartments located just 250m from the Place des Lices and has a private heated pool for its residents set within a landscaped garden full of scented Mediterranean vegetation. There is individual air conditioning for each room, home automation to control your appliances & security remotely, large format tiles and a safe amongst other things plus underground parking. Use this as your main or second home or if you wish you can sign a rental mandate with Avecoeur who provide quasi hotel services and concierge for short term bookings. If you sign this mandate and rent your apartment out for at least a few weeks each year you will benefit from receiving back all the VAT included in your purchase price (20%) but also of course the rental income received less the commission. Avecoeur, in addition to property management are also developers, interior designers and mortgage brokers, making the group a unique one stop shop for property investors in France.
Saint-Tropez Serenity is located in a calm residential area, just 250m from the famous Place des Lices and just 450m to the marina where, during the summer, you will find some of the world's finest yachts and sailing boats. Around Place des Lices and the marina there is an excellent selection of boutique shops, restauarnts, bars and cafes with regular markets during the summer months. There is so much to discover in this charming old fishing village and in the evening there is plenty of nightlife to keep you entertained. A 7 minute drive away you can reach the sandy beaches of La Ramatuelle and discover some world famous beach clubs on Plage Pampelonne such as Bagatelle and Nikki Beach.
j:translation_en.title: 3 bedroom luxury Apartment for sale in Saint-Tropez, Provence-Alpes-Cte d'Azur - 131268385

j:translation_en.description: A BARNES Exclusive - Paris 16th: Located on one of the most beautiful avenues in Paris, on the 6th floor, with a south-facing terrace, no overlooking, and in a very high-end, secure building with parking access directly to the apartment. This building, which was the residence of Grace Kelly and Brigitte Bardot in the 1960s, offers a typical Parisian property with views of the Eiffel Tower and the Arc de Triomphe. This characterful apartment with generous volumes spans 330 m², featuring a landscaped terrace and continuous balconies of over 70 m². The property includes an ideal layout with an entrance hall and gallery leading to a spacious double living room opening onto the continuous balcony and the terrace, a dining room opening onto a continuous balcony, a fully equipped eat-in kitchen, a master suite with a bathroom and walk-in closet, opening onto the balcony, four other bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms and balconies. This apartment, which is cross-facing, offers beautiful volumes, exceptional natural light, and a full south-facing exposure. It retains all the charm of the old with wood paneling, moldings, fireplaces, and hardwood floors. The apartment includes air conditioning, security cameras, and an alarm system. A service studio of about 15 m² on the 1st floor, a double garage in the building, and a cellar of almost 34 m² complete this rare property. The property can be sold fully furnished with a listing. Agency fees payable by vendor - Nombre de lots dans la copropriété: 81 - Montant moyen de la quote-part de charges courantes 18,132 €/yearly - Montant estimé des dépenses annuelles d'énergie pour un usage standard, établi à partir des prix de l'énergie de l'année 2021.2022.2023 : 6720€ ~ 9160€ -
j:translation_en.title: 8 room luxury Apartment for sale in La Muette, Auteuil, Porte Dauphine, France - 131301832

j:translation_en.description:
Exceptionnal. Welcome to La Fontaine, an exceptional property where charm comes to life, and each day is a celebration of the art of living in the Provencal style.
Nestled in the heart of Mediterranean landscapes, this former farmhouse with Jasmines offers a unique living experience, capturing the spirit of the Provencal village where each building is a perfect fusion of traditional charm and the art of family living.
Ideally located in Mougins, this property provides easy access to famous Michelin-starred restaurants, renowned art galleries, and prestigious golf courses. Enjoy Mediterranean life in all its splendor while remaining close to the amenities and attractions of the region. Noble materials create a warm atmosphere, while spacious living spaces offer absolute comfort. From bright lounges to elegant bedrooms, each space has been designed with attention to detail and a quest for excellence, such as the master bedroom space of over 100 square meters accessible by an elevator. The lush gardens surrounding the property add a magical dimension. Centennial olive trees, flower beds, a rose garden, an orchard, and a heated pool create an idyllic setting for moments of relaxation and entertainment under the sun of the French Riviera. The panoramic view of the green hills of Mougins, the sea, and the Esterel mountains completes this exceptional experience.
Contact us today to discover this outstanding residence and turn your dreams into reality.
j:translation_en.title: 19 room luxury House for sale in Mougins, France - 130060108

j:translation_en.description: Overview A beautiful chartreuse-style stone house with guest house, set in delightful private gardens with lovely countryside views close to one of the Gers' most historically interesting villages. Renovated to a high standard and set over two floors, this property is ideal for hosting with its seven bedrooms and children's dormitory. Wandering around we can't help but imagine large family gatherings or delightful soires in the generous entertaining spaces. Outside, a wonderful terrace overlooks a large swimming pool, and a second, covered terrace is the perfect lounging area complete with hanging day bed. As well as the large living and dining rooms, the cinema room, playroom and summer kitchen add to the entertaining possibilities, ensuring total relaxation and leisure. We approach the property through grand ornate iron gates and along a winding gravel drive surrounded by gardens on all sides, thoughtfully planted with flowers, shrubs and trees. Ample parking space is available at the end of the drive. The main house We enter through double-glazed, hand painted wooden doors into a large entrance room with chequerboard tiled floor and an elegant working fireplace. Head straight through glazed double doors into a hallway from which three double ensuite bedrooms can be found. All are beautifully appointed with modern shower rooms and WCs, some with double-glazed doors that open directly onto the impeccably maintained gardens. Further along the hallway is a handy storage room with built-in cupboards, and another part-glazed door leading out on the terrace. The ground floor living areas Back in the central hallway, we enter a room currently used as a study and fitted out with handmade bookshelves. We are then drawn to a large dining room which flows seamlessly to the kitchen and spacious living room. The suspended view from these rooms is mesmerising and the owners have ensured it is fully captured from all angles by adding full width windows and central double-glazed doors along the entire wall. Light floods the room and, in cooler months, the grand stone fireplace is the perfect place to cosy up in front of a roaring fire with a good book. With its terracotta floor, laid throughout the entire ground floor, exposed beams and impressive stone fireplace this room is full of character and an exceptionally serene place to relax. At the other end of the hallway are some practical utility spaces including a WC, laundry room and more cupboards. The kitchen The modern kitchen is accessed via the dining room as well as from the outside covered terraced. It has been decorated in a cheerful orange colour scheme with induction hob, fitted oven and plenty of fitted base and wall cupboards. The first floor We climb the original oak stairs beneath a stunning glass chandelier and arrive at a landing from which the master suite can be accessed. The bedroom benefits from a large adjoining shower room with a separate WC, a vast walk-in dressing room fitted with open wardrobes and hanging rails. Also on this floor is a cinema room and and a children's bedroom / playroom with eight sweet cabin beds prettily dressed with curtains through which we can imagine tiny giggling faces peeping. A door from the cinema room opens into a warm and immaculate attic area which doubles as a laundry drying space but could be developed into an additional room. The indoor-outdoor leisure spaces Alongside the kitchen is an attractive and inviting covered terrace area with tiled floor and original beams. Decorated in Moroccan style, with comfortable hanging beds, softly draping fabric and sheer floor length curtains which float pleasantly in the wind, it is the perfect place to relax or host an aperitif on a hot summer's evening. Further along the terrace, a games room offers additional entertainment thanks to its pool and football tables, and next to it a summer kitchen links back to the inside of the main house. The guest house Accessed from both the garden terrace and the main gravel driveway is an adjoining two-bedroom cottage offering additional accommodation for friends and family, which could also be used as a self-contained guest house. It is modern in style and beautifully appointed, yet retains original features including wooden beams and stone walls. We enter through glazed doors into the bright living room with its smart, modern floor tiles. Ahead is a modern staircase and the kitchen, with wide double-glazed doors that lead out onto one of the two covered terraces, with lovely views across the garden and the woodland beyond. The kitchen is smart with white cupboards and marble effect worktops and a built-in fridge freezer, induction hob, cooker and cooker hood. Alongside is a WC and sink and a laundry room. Upstairs we find two large bedrooms, each en suite with large shower cubicles and modern sink units. Both rooms are stylishly decorated yet retain elements of period charm thanks to the high-eaved ceilings, wooden beams and floors. One bedroom looks out across the rear garden and the other over the front garden, both with beautifully planted flower beds alongside lush lawns. The guest house benefits from its own covered terraces, beautifully styled and with attractive privacy screens, contemporary lighting, built in seating and pretty planting. The outdoor space and gardens At the far end of the main house is a large workshop and a garage, the latter benefitting from a new electric door. The spaces could be connected but for now each offers ample storage space for garden equipment and vehicles. The setting for this property is simply delightful and the current owners have taken great pride in ensuring the surrounding gardens and terraces are thoughtfully planned and planted with a mix of flowers, shrubs and trees. The terraced areas to the rear are immaculate with pergolas, barbecue areas, outdoor lighting, stone walls and planting alongside which soften the space and create a feeling of privacy whilst making the most of the view. We head from the main terrace down stone steps to the private pool area. The pool is 20 m long and 3m wide so offers keen swimmers the chance to enjoy endless laps whilst enjoying the view. To the side of the house is a copse of mature trees providing much needed shade in the hot summer months. The owner has levelled the land beneath to make a neat outdoor space that stretches out towards neighbouring farmer's fields. What we love here at Bliss We love the blend of modern and original charm in this property. It is newly renovated and well looked after which makes it both practical and a delight to spend time in. The ground floor flows seamlessly from room to room, and we are impressed with the current owners' focus on maximising light wherever possible thanks to the addition of new, high-quality wooden windows and glazed doors. They also cleverly connect the front of the house to the rear gardens and view, adding a sense of tranquillity and peace. What is more, the owners' love of landscaping and gardening has meant they have created a simply beautiful environment for outdoor living, swimming and entertaining. Who would this property suit? A large and growing family or someone who wants to run a high end, boutique-style chambre d'htes with the option of a guest house for longer stays. The guest house also provides the flexibility of the new owner living on site while running the hotel. The excellent location on the fringes of a charming village and in an area famed for its vineyards should prove advantageous for a tourist activity whilst also being an idyllic, rural base for setting up a permanent or second home.
j:translation_en.title: 13 room luxury Villa for sale in Condom, France - 131238460

j:translation_en.description: The Meyreuil Real Estate Office presents this 280 m² architect-designed house with panoramic views for sale. Location and context: Ideally located just a few minutes from Aix-en-Provence city center and 12 minutes from the International Bilingual School (IBS), this property sits on a 4,000 m² plot, offering easy access to local amenities. Interior description: This renovated house offers a spacious 100 m² living area with a custom-designed kitchen and a laundry room, facing southeast and opening onto a terrace. The lower level consists of three suites with en-suite shower rooms and direct access to the pool, as well as a separate toilet and dressing area. A separate 60 m² one-bedroom apartment with a private terrace can be connected to the house. Exterior features: The garden includes a 17-meter saltwater swimming lane, a wide exotic wood deck, a pétanque court, and a vast green area. Additional amenities: The property includes a 37 m² garage, a 21 m² cellar, a spacious parking area, ducted air conditioning, home automation systems, surveillance cameras, and an automatic gate. --
j:translation_en.title: 6 room luxury Villa for sale in Meyreuil, French Riviera - 131706638

j:translation_en.description:
Exclusive Michal Zingraf Real Estate - In one of the most prestigious stone buildings in Bordeaux's historic centre, this unique flat occupies the entire second floor and offers a breathtaking view of the Grand Thtre and its twelve majestic columns. An exceptional property, steeped in history, where architectural refinement meets contemporary comfort.
From the moment you enter, the tone is set: a vast, generously proportioned lounge opens onto the Place de la Comdie, enhanced by elegant gilding and a Murano glass chandelier of rare beauty. The period parquet flooring, with its intricate patterns, adds a touch of authenticity and nobility to this unique space. At its centre, a listed fireplace designed by Victor Louis, architect of the Grand Thtre, bears witness to the history and prestige of the premises.
The flat has three bedrooms, including a sumptuous master suite designed as a haven of peace. The top-of-the-range Italian kitchen combines aesthetics and functionality, making it ideal for food lovers.
A rare and unusual property at the most sought-after address in Bordeaux.
An architectural gem for exceptional connoisseurs.
j:translation_en.title: 4 room luxury Flat for sale in Bordeaux, Nouvelle-Aquitaine - 131093409

Saint-Aygulf Sea Views, Serenity, and Sophistication
Happiness begins heresunrise over the sea, the beach within walking distance, and peace all around. Ideally located in the heart of Saint-Aygulf, this stunning 5-room villa offers a rare blend of comfort, elegance, and natural beauty.
Set on a beautifully landscaped 1,125 m plot, the villa enjoys a quiet setting just steps from shops and the coast. Inside, light floods the generous living spaces. The open-plan living and dining area with fully equipped kitchen opens onto a 34 m sea-view terraceperfect for relaxing or entertaining. A cozy lounge continues the space outdoors, ideal for all seasons.
The main level offers a bedroom with sea view, a bathroom with WC, and a guest toilet. On the garden level, two additional bedrooms, a separate bathroom, a laundry room, and a 20 m garage provide comfort and functionality. Outside, everything is designed for leisure: a swimming pool, a cabana, a ptanque court, and ample parking.
A rare opportunity to own a refined coastal retreat where lifestyle and location align perfectly. Contact me today to discover this exceptional property.

j:translation_en.description:
In a very quiet and most private setting, the elegance and refinement of a historic property in perfect condition, built in 1950 by Hlna Rubinstein with the renowned architect Louis Se, comprising a main house of 491 sq.m living space, two guest houses, a caretaker's accommodation and a former sheepfold renovated throughout, amidst enchanting grounds of 31 523 sq.m.
The ground floor of the main house features an office, and three bedrooms - each with an en-suite shower room. The garden level includes a reception room, a games room, the living and dining room with adjoining kitchen, utility room and laundry room. The first floor is dedicated to the master suite with dressing room and complete bathroom, as well as a 5th suite with shower room.
The first guest house encompasses a living room, a kitchen, 2 bedrooms with adjoining shower rooms.
The second guest house comprises a living and dining room, an open-plan kitchen with utility room and laundry room. On the 1st floor, three bedrooms, two shower rooms and a full bathroom.
The caretaker's house of approximately 70 sq.m offers a living room, a kitchen, two bedrooms, a bathroom and includes three closed garages.
An old sheepfold of 86 sqm living space, tastefully renovated throughout, called 'La Maison des Artistes' features a large living room, a dining room and open kitchen, a spacious bedroom with shower room.
Five closed garages in all, 5 gates.
The park is planted with 450 olive trees, includes several springs, a heated swimming pool and a petanque pitch.
A timeless journey for lovers of history and architectural references in a classy setting.
j:translation_en.title: 12 bedroom luxury House for sale in Grasse, French Riviera - 128007593

j:translation_en.description:
IN THE HEART OF THE ALPILLES REGIONAL NATURAL PARK
SAINT REMY DE PROVENCE The Capital of the Alpilles
This townhouse is located in the golden triangle, a 7-minute walk from the city center and in a quiet area. A stone's throw from the archaeological site of Glanum. Its surface area is 280 sqm useful, the main house with a surface area of 215 sqm includes:
On the ground floor: an entrance hall, a beautiful living space of approximately 85 sqm living room with fireplace dining room equipped kitchen office with three French windows providing access to a spacious terrace in the shade of a trellis and to the garden, two bedrooms each with their own shower room wc and a dressing room
On the 1st floor: a large hallway, four bedrooms, a bathroom wc, a shower room wc, a large terrace with a view of the Alpilles mountain range
Then an independent guest house on one level with a surface area of 65 sqm useful including; a living space living room dining room open kitchen equipped, two bedrooms, a bathroom, separate toilet, a large terrace
Outside: a summer kitchen dining room awning with laundry room and toilets A heated and secure swimming pool of 12 meters x 6 meters A landscaped and enclosed garden of a surface area of 1405 sqm with a bowling green, the property benefits from two accesses with separate gates thus allowing to have an independent entrance for maintenance, the pool builder, the gardener etc. It is possible to park several cars inside the property. It is supplied with city water plus a well, there is plenty of outdoor lighting and an automatic watering system. This comfortable home is equipped with gas central heating by underfloor heating. It is equipped with an alarm system.
A south-facing home, very bright and pleasant to live in. It can meet various projects of main residence or second home but also as an investment with a good profitability in seasonal rental.
This property is truly unique for sale, a real favorite!
j:translation_en.title: 10 room luxury House for sale in Saint-Rmy-de-Provence, France - 130971338

j:translation_en.description:
Hidden within a wooded and fenced park of nearly a hectare, this charming Belle poque residence symbolizes the sweetness of life in Saint-Raphal. Located just a stone's throw from the prestigious Valescure Old Course Golf & Tennis Club, this 1893 property, renovated in 2024, offers a haven of peace amidst century-old oaks, lush palm trees, and majestic cedars, just 5 minutes from all amenities.
The property spans 6,623 square meters and includes a Palladian-style villa of 440 square meters as well as a caretaker's house of 76 square meters. The main residence consists of 13 rooms spread over 3 levels, with 5 bedrooms including a master suite with its private terrace, two spacious suites opening onto a terrace, and a large children's room in the attic.
The ground floor welcomes a spacious living-dining room open onto a gallery, a magnificent retro-chic kitchen with dining area, an elegant office, and a wardrobe. This level is extended by two shaded terraces overlooking the pool and its large beach, offering a space for relaxation or receptions as needed.
The main period elements such as fireplaces and ornamental paintings have been preserved to maintain the exceptional character of this residence. Elegant and refined, this residence offers luxurious amenities: generously sized infinity pool, gym, relaxation area, wine cellar, cinema, game room, and petanque court. The property is completed by a caretaker's house with a separate apartment featuring a living room, equipped kitchen, bedroom, and bathroom. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (2024-06-16)
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Villa for sale in Saint-Raphal, French Riviera - 130467704

j:translation_en.description: Discover Grand crin Chtel, a PRESTIGIOUS ALPINE residence in Haute-Savoie. With ELEGANT ARCHITECTURE, PREMIUM AMENITIES, and ski-in/ski-out access to LES PORTES DE SOLEIL, it offers 49 REFINED apartments for unforgettable mountain stays. Grand crin Chtel: A Peak of Refinement in Haute-Savoie Located at the gateway to the charming village of Chtel, Grand crin Chtel is a prestigious alpine residence offering unparalleled comfort and style. Nestled in the iconic Les Portes du Soleil ski domain, this residence combines authentic Savoyard architecture with modern luxury. Its design features wooden facades, natural stone accents, and sloped roofs that harmoniously blend with the surrounding Alpine environment. Grand crin Chtel includes 49 exquisitely crafted apartments, ranging from 2 to 7 rooms. Each unit is fully furnished and decorated with meticulous attention to detail, ensuring a blend of tradition and contemporary comfort. Select apartments feature fireplaces, adding to the cozy, luxurious ambiance. The residence is enriched with premium facilities, including a heated indoor pool, spa, hammam, and sauna, ensuring relaxation after exhilarating days on the slopes. Chtel: A Year-Round Alpine Gem Chtel is a picturesque village and a gateway to Les Portes du Soleil, a vast ski area boasting over 600 km of trails across 12 interconnected resorts in France and Switzerland. During the winter months, the village offers world-class skiing, snowboarding, and winter sports. In the summer, Chtel transforms into a haven for hikers, mountain bikers, and nature enthusiasts, with lush landscapes and breathtaking vistas. The village itself charms visitors with its traditional chalets, lively center, and renowned Savoyard cuisine. Easily accessible from Geneva (1.5 hours), Chtel attracts an international clientele seeking memorable experiences in the Alps. Why Choose Sogeprom and CGH? Sogeprom - Group Socit Gnrale, a leader in sustainable development, ensures that every project respects environmental standards while prioritizing quality and innovation. With a strong commitment to eco-conscious building practices and the integration of green spaces, Sogeprom creates homes that are both elegant and environmentally responsible. Partnering with CGH Rsidences & Spas, renowned for managing 5-star residences, Grand crin Chtel offers exceptional rental management and personalized services. CGH's des Cimes spas provide luxurious wellness experiences, while their concierge services ensure that every stay is effortless and indulgent. Investing in Grand crin Chtel means choosing an exclusive lifestyle, a worry-free rental opportunity, and a secure asset in one of the most sought-after alpine locations. Whether for personal enjoyment or as a long-term investment, this residence is the ultimate choice for a premium mountain retreat.
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury Apartment for sale in 1083 ROUTE DE THONON, Chtel, Haute-Savoie, Auvergne-Rhne-Alpes - 131083831

j:translation_en.description: Villa 15 at La Foret d'Armotte- a luxury residence in South-West France perfectly located on the edge of a forest, a few minutes to the beach and golf courses and 500m from the village center of Saint-Augustin-Sur-Mer. The development includes 20 luxury 4 bed-4 bath detached villas each with their own private parking places, pool, jacuzzi, terrace and garden. Both the interior and exterior of the properties combine the best of classic architecture with contemporary design and are finished to the highest specifications. They come complete with fitted and equipped kitchens and a full furniture and equipment package so that they are ready to rent out or use immediately with the minimum of fuss for the purchasers. The residence itself includes a tennis court, petanque area, recreation/sports area and a reception to rent the properties out (if you wish) and provide cleaning and linen to the resort owners/guests and generally offer a helping hand. The residence is accessible all year round and will attract a good mix of international and French holiday makers. As these villas are off-plan they can be personalized to your taste which might include re-arranging the interior layout or removing bedrooms/bathrooms, adding storage rooms, garages etc. They also use the latest energy saving techniques such as better insulation. More efficient heating mechanisms and solar panels to make them more environmentally friendly whilst also saving you thousands of pounds on your heating bills. They will have an energy rating of A- the most efficient you can get today. Owners are under no obligation whatsoever to rent out their villa and they may live in it all year round if they wish but if they do wish to rent it out there is an experienced management company onsite which apart from taking care of the maintenance and security of the villas also offer owners the option to rent their properties out when they are not there or all of the time if desired. Renting through Avecoeur would also enable the owner to have the 20% VAT rebated which is a large saving. Saint Augustin-sur-Mer This is a fantastic location to spend your holidays with activities for all the family including surfing, sailing and swimming in the sea and lake and hiking, biking and horse-riding in the forests and beach, fishing, climbing and much more. There is also a water-park and zoo very close by and plenty of vineyards, chateaux, museums and places of historical and cultural interest. There are local markets too selling fresh local produce and lots of festivals and events throughout the year to offer a variety of entertainment. The great selection of local restaurants, cafes, bars and boutique shops also ensure that you are never bored here. It is an area well worth visiting if you have never been before. The fabulous towns of La Rochelle and Bordeaux and the islands of Ile de Re and Ile d'Oleron are a short drive away and the seaside resorts of Royan and St Palais are 8km and 4km away respectively. Access is easy with a Tgv station at La Rochelle, a train station at Royan, regular bus routes to St Augustin while La Rochelle airport is under an hour away and Bordeaux just an hour and a half away.
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury House for sale in 18 Rue de la Bessure, 17570, Saint-Palais-sur-Mer, Charente-Maritime, Nouvelle-Aquitaine - 130857594

The fabulous towns of La Rochelle and Bordeaux and the islands of Ile de Re and Ile d'Oleron are a short drive away and the seaside resorts of Royan and St Palais are 8km and 4km away respectively. Access is easy with a Tgv station at La Rochelle, a train station at Royan, regular bus routes to St Augustin while La Rochelle airport is under an hour away and Bordeaux just an hour and a half away.
j:translation_fr.title: Maison de vacances, Saint-Palais-sur-Mer, Charente-Maritime

j:translation_en.description:
Facing Hauts de Cagnes, this spacious property, in a dominant position, offers a peaceful, leafy setting with exceptional panoramic sea views, as well as a breathtaking view of the old village and the Hauts de Cagnes castle.
Recently renovated, it extends over approx. 435 sqm and features a vast, bright living room with dining area, opening onto an elegant kitchen, all with access to a large, sunny terrace.
The house has 6 bedrooms with en suite bathrooms, plus an independent house with 2 additional bedrooms.
The 6,930 sqm landscaped grounds include a superb infinity pool, garage and plenty of storage space.
Close to shops and schools, the property is just 10 minutes from Nice Cte d'Azur international airport.

j:translation_en.description:
Luxuary villa located in Valbonne
An exceptional opportunity with this splendid new contemporary villa situated close to the charming old village. This modern country home is set within more than one hectare of private forest, offering complete tranquillity and stunning views across the surrounding hills. Nestled at the heart of a beautifully landscaped garden, the residence combines contemporary design with natural beauty to create an idyllic retreat.
With a generous interior space of 700 square metres, the villa boasts impressive high ceilings, a spacious reception hall and seven elegant bedrooms, each with its own en-suite bathroom. Designed for both comfort and luxury, the property also includes a private spa, a fully equipped fitness area and a large garage. A magnificent swimming pool measuring twenty by eight metres enhances the outdoor space, providing a true sense of luxury and relaxation.
Additional features include an irrigation sprinkler system, outdoor lighting, optical fibre connectivity, air conditioning, double glazing, sliding windows, secure fencing, an advanced alarm system and an electric gate for added peace of mind. Completion of this remarkable home is scheduled for early 2025.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa for sale in Valbonne, France - 131631510

j:translation_en.description:
Nestled in a lush green setting, this charming Provenal villa with bastide-style architecture embodies the charm and elegance of the South of France.
Its spacious interior embraces the hallmarks of Provenal architecture, with terracotta floors, vaulted ceilings, and elements of plaster and stone, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere.
The villa offers a total of 4 bedrooms, complemented by a large living area and a superb covered terrace extending from the kitchenperfect for long, beautiful summer evenings.
An independent building can be adapted as a gym, an office, or guest accommodation.
The landscaped garden, a true oasis of tranquility, is a major asset of this villa.Olive trees, palm trees, cypress trees, and various types of bushes blend perfectly with the architectural style of the property.
Located just minutes from the picturesque village of Valbonne, known for its friendly atmosphere year-round, and close to international schools, this villa is a true haven of peace.

This post-modern seaside villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury. Designed with a distinctive architectural aesthetic, this residence strikes a perfect balance between elegance and functionality.

The bright and open living spaces are adorned with premium materials and stylish finishes, creating an ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. Expansive windows offer panoramic views of the ocean, while sunny terraces and the infinity pool beckon to fully enjoy the Mediterranean climate.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, provide luxurious comfort and complete privacy for residents and guests.

Cette villa post-moderne en bord de mer incarne le summum du luxe contemporain. Conçue avec une esthétique architecturale distinctive, cette résidence offre un équilibre parfait entre élégance et fonctionnalité.

Les espaces de vie lumineux et ouverts sont ornés de matériaux de qualité supérieure et de finitions élégantes, créant un cadre idéal pour se détendre et se divertir. Les vastes baies vitrées offrent une vue panoramique sur l'océan, tandis que les terrasses ensoleillées et la piscine à débordement invitent à profiter pleinement du climat méditerranéen.

j:translation_en.description:
UZES
Historic center, a stone's throw from the Chteau Ducal known as Duch.
A prestigious and characterful apartment with a garden and an interior courtyard.
This exceptional apartment is located on the ground floor of an ISMH-listed private mansion dating from the 16th century with a superb private garden, its authenticity, refinement and elegance will seduce you.
Its surface area is 193 sqm + 68 sqm of private garden and 30 sqm of vaulted cellar.
By pushing the front door from the street you enter the hall of the private mansion and discover a superb ceremonial stone staircase with magnificent balusters which leads to the upper levels, a real favorite, then the courtyard square interior and the beautiful facades of the building with its caryatids.
The apartment is composed of a gallery entrance hall, a magnificent reception room with a surface area of 63.50 m2 with a high ceiling of approximately 6.50 meters, a beautiful Louis XV fireplace and a superb overmantel, two very large French doors giving access to the wooded garden on the south side, a kitchen with beautiful old elements, stone fireplace and bread oven which is fully equipped with high-end elements, steam oven etc..., three bedrooms including one with its dressing room and two bathrooms.
This very comfortable apartment benefits from underfloor heating.
It is in perfect condition, with very beautiful architectural elements and high quality services.
In absolute calm while being in the city center and a stone's throw from the Place aux Herbes, this apartment is ideal for various main residence or pied--terre projects.
Avignon TGV station 45 minutes away, Nmes airport 40 minutes away, A9 motorway 15 kilometers away
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury Apartment for sale in Uzs, Occitanie - 130245946

This very comfortable apartment benefits from underfloor heating. It is in perfect condition, with very beautiful architectural elements and high quality services. This villa epitomizes the essence of contemporary design. With its sleek lines and glass faade, this house dazzles at first sight. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a warm and airy atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the surrounding landscape.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, offer luxurious comfort and total privacy for residents and guests.

This house is designed for outdoor living. The expansive terrace, with its seating area and outdoor dining space, is the perfect spot to relax and soak up the sun. The garden provides an idyllic setting for outdoor activities and family relaxation.

Cette villa incarne l'essence même du design contemporain. Avec ses lignes épurées et sa façade en verre, cette maison éblouit dès le premier regard. Les grandes baies vitrées inondent les espaces intérieurs de lumière naturelle, créant une atmosphère chaleureuse et aérée qui se fond harmonieusement avec le paysage environnant.

j:translation_en.description: Belle villa Vue de Rêve à Bonifacio Luxe Properties vous propose, en exclusivité, un site d’exception sur les hauteurs préservées de Bancarello, à seulement quelques minutes du port de plaisance et du centre historique de Bonifacio. Ici, ce n’est pas simplement un bien immobilier que vous découvrez, mais un panorama à couper le souffle, une véritable scène naturelle à 220°, où la mer, la citadelle de Bonifacio, les majestueuses Bouches de Bonifacio et les côtes de Sardaigne se fondent dans une seule et même vision époustouflante.  Cette vue, unique, spectaculaire, inaltérable, s’étire à perte de regard dans un calme absolu, sans vis-à-vis, au sein d’un environnement classé, protégé et non urbanisable un privilège rare sur le littoral corse. Le terrain, d’une surface de près de 5600 m², constitue à lui seul une œuvre paysagère remarquable.  On y pénètre comme dans un domaine méditerranéen ancien, structuré autour de 68 oliviers centenaires qui trônent en majesté au cœur d’une oliveraie sculptée par des murets en pierre sèche de Bonifacio, évoquant l’authenticité du terroir insulaire. Figuiers, agrumes, senteurs du maquis... chaque essence ici semble avoir été choisie pour dialoguer avec la nature environnante. Ce terrain d’une beauté souveraine pourrait accueillir, si désiré, une installation discrète telle qu’un court de tennis ou un terrain de padel, sans altérer l’harmonie visuelle ni la quiétude des lieux. Ce que vous achetez avant tout ici, c’est une situation géographique exceptionnelle, une orientation idéale, un écrin de nature et de silence face à l’un des plus beaux panoramas maritimes de Corse. La maison, construite par un architecte dans les années 1990, s’intègre discrètement dans le paysage avec une architecture à niveaux décalés, pensée pour capter la lumière et s’ouvrir largement sur la mer. Elle développe environ 216 m² de surface brute (SHOB) répartis en cinq chambres, dont deux suites, un salon avec cheminée, une cuisine indépendante et conviviale, prolongée par une cuisine d’été couverte. Plusieurs terrasses suspendues, une piscine chauffée, un solarium, un four à bois et un barbecue viennent enrichir les espaces extérieurs. Un garage-atelier et un carport complètent ce cadre de vie.  vous l’assure, l’essentiel n’est pas là, la véritable valeur de ce bien réside dans sa parcelle, dans sa vue, dans sa rareté foncière.
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury Apartment for sale in Bonifacio, France - 131631711

j:translation_fr.description: Belle villa Vue de Rêve à Bonifacio Luxe Properties international vous propose, en exclusivité, un site d’exception sur les hauteurs préservées de Bancarello, à seulement quelques minutes du port de plaisance et du centre historique de Bonifacio. Ici, ce n’est pas simplement un bien immobilier que vous découvrez, mais un panorama à couper le souffle, une véritable scène naturelle à 220°, où la mer, la citadelle de Bonifacio, les majestueuses Bouches de Bonifacio et les côtes de Sardaigne se fondent dans une seule et même vision époustouflante.  Cette vue, unique, spectaculaire, inaltérable, s’étire à perte de regard dans un calme absolu, sans vis-à-vis, au sein d’un environnement classé, protégé et non urbanisable un privilège rare sur le littoral corse. Le terrain, d’une surface de près de 5600 m², constitue à lui seul une œuvre paysagère remarquable.  On y pénètre comme dans un domaine méditerranéen ancien, structuré autour de 68 oliviers centenaires qui trônent en majesté au cœur d’une oliveraie sculptée par des murets en pierre sèche de Bonifacio, évoquant l’authenticité du terroir insulaire. Figuiers, agrumes, senteurs du maquis... chaque essence ici semble avoir été choisie pour dialoguer avec la nature environnante. Ce terrain d’une beauté souveraine pourrait accueillir, si désiré, une installation discrète telle qu’un court de tennis ou un terrain de padel, sans altérer l’harmonie visuelle ni la quiétude des lieux. Ce que vous achetez avant tout ici, c’est une situation géographique exceptionnelle, une orientation idéale, un écrin de nature et de silence face à l’un des plus beaux panoramas maritimes de Corse. La maison, construite par un architecte dans les années 1990, s’intègre discrètement dans le paysage avec une architecture à niveaux décalés, pensée pour capter la lumière et s’ouvrir largement sur la mer. Elle développe environ 216 m² de surface brute (SHOB) répartis en cinq chambres, dont deux suites, un salon avec cheminée, une cuisine indépendante et conviviale, prolongée par une cuisine d’été couverte. Plusieurs terrasses suspendues, une piscine chauffée, un solarium, un four à bois et un barbecue viennent enrichir les espaces extérieurs. Un garage-atelier et un carport complètent ce cadre de vie.  vous l’assure, l’essentiel n’est pas là, la véritable valeur de ce bien réside dans sa parcelle, dans sa vue, dans sa rareté foncière. La villa, bien que fonctionnelle, mérite aujourd’hui une remise au goût du jour pour révéler pleinement le potentiel de ce site d’exception. Une rénovation respectueuse de l’âme du lieu et du style méditerranéen permettra d’y insuffler les standards de confort et d’élégance contemporains, sans jamais trahir l’esprit de ce paysage. Ce bien ne se mesure pas en mètres carrés, mais en émotions. Il s’agit d’un lieu de contemplation, de silence et de lumière, où le regard se perd entre ciel, mer et maquis. Depuis chaque terrasse, chaque fenêtre, chaque recoin du jardin, la nature impose sa majesté. L’ambiance y est précieuse, apaisante, presque sacrée. À l’écart de l’agitation estivale, tout en restant à proximité immédiate des plus belles plages et des infrastructures de Bonifacio, cette propriété offre un cadre de vie privilégié, rare, introuvable, où authenticité corse, art de vivre méditerranéen et sécurité foncière se conjuguent en un seul et même lieu. Pour toute demande d’information ou pour organiser une visite confidentielle, contactez sans délai 7/7 jours de 8 h à 23 h Surfaces1 Salon1 Salle à manger/Cuisine1 Suite4 Chambres3 Toilettes1 Salle de bains1 Salle de douche1 Buanderie1 Cellier1 Solarium3 Terrasses1 Garage6 Parkings extérieurs1 Abri de jardin1 Terrain 5599 m²
j:translation_fr.title: Vue exceptionnelle sur la Mditerrane. Corse du sud

j:translation_en.description:
Located just a short walk from the center of the village of Gordes, this stunning dry-stone villa offers approximately 210 m of living space set on a landscaped plot of 2,929 m. Blending Provenal charm with contemporary comfort, the property enjoys a peaceful setting with open views of the Luberon mountains and surrounding hills.
The entrance opens onto a spacious 25 m hall, leading to bright living areas. The 35 m living and dining room opens onto a south-facing terrace, perfect for enjoying the Provenal climate. The generous 34 m kitchen is fully equipped and features a central dining area and quality, characterful furnishings. Three bedrooms are located on the ground floor, each with its own en-suite shower room. One of them has direct access to a private terrace, creating a secluded and peaceful retreat.
Upstairs, two additional bedrooms share a shower room, ideal for children or guests. The house is designed throughout to offer optimal comfort, whether as a main residence or a holiday home.
Outside, several terraces offer different exposures and atmospheres within the carefully landscaped garden. A large heated swimming pool fits harmoniously into the natural setting, bordered by wooden decking, shaded areas, and a delightful ptanque court for moments of conviviality. A well, a borehole, and an irrigation system complete the outdoor features, ensuring easy garden maintenance and autonomous water supply.
The property also includes an electric gate, an alarm system, and elegant outdoor lighting, ensuring both comfort and security. The garden, planted with Mediterranean species, offers great privacy while allowing the view to unfold over the hills of the Luberon.
This property is a rare opportunity in one of the most sought-after villages in Provence. Charm, comfort, and authenticity come together here in perfect harmony to offer an exceptional quality of life. For further information or to arrange a viewing, please contact us.
j:translation_en.title: 9 room luxury Villa for sale in Gordes, France - 130533789

Upstairs, two additional bedrooms share a shower room, ideal for children or guests. The house is designed throughout to offer optimal comfort, whether as a main residence or a holiday home. Outside, several terraces offer different exposures and atmospheres within the carefully landscaped garden. A large heated swimming pool fits harmoniously into the natural setting, bordered by wooden decking, shaded areas, and a delightful pétanque court for moments of conviviality. A well, a borehole, and an irrigation system complete the outdoor features, ensuring easy garden maintenance and autonomous water supply. The property also includes an electric gate, an alarm system, and elegant outdoor lighting, ensuring both comfort and security. The garden, planted with Mediterranean species, offers great privacy while allowing the view to unfold over the hills of the Luberon. This property is a rare opportunity in one of the most sought-after villages in Provence. Charm, comfort, and authenticity come together here in perfect harmony to offer an exceptional quality of life. For further information or to arrange a viewing, please contact us.
j:translation_fr.title: Mas provencal, Gordes

j:translation_en.description: This 12-room bastide. constructed with traditional high-quality materials. features several spacious and bright living areas spanning a magnificent 565m. It is a wonderful property for hosting family. friends. and business associates. This Provencal bastide is situated in the 'Plaine des Maures' nature reserve. on 8.6 hectares of land. including 5.4 hectares of leased AOC Ctes de Provence vineyards. Ground floor: An impressive living/dining room of 90 m with stunning views over the garden and vineyards. The large fireplace and beams create a welcoming ambiance. The second living room. measuring 31 m. is cozy and also features a fireplace. There is a dining room. a large 47 m fitted kitchen. 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. and 2 offices. 1st floor: 3 bedrooms with shower rooms and 1 office. This prestigious residence also includes 2 large garages with space for 6 cars. as well as a 170 m pool-house (with living room. bedroom. kitchen. and bathroom) adjacent to a swimming pool measuring 6m by 12m and a Jacuzzi for relaxing and enjoying sunny days with breathtaking views over the vineyards. This exceptional property offers an idyllic setting for nature and wine lovers and has great potential for further development. Please contact us for further information or to schedule a viewing.

j:translation_en.description:
Luxuary villa located in Vieil Antibes
Tucked away on the gentle, west-facing slope of the prestigious Cap dAntibes, this elegant Belle poque villa enjoys an enviable location just a short stroll from the soft, sandy beaches, the lively Port Gallice, and the renowned restaurants of Juan-les-Pins. Set within beautifully landscaped, level grounds of 2,408 square metres, the property offers both privacy and proximity to the sea, with two separate entrances: a private pathway leading directly towards the coastline, and a grand main entrance graced by a majestic staircase.
The villa spans a generous 363 square metres and exudes timeless charm and sophistication. The interior welcomes you with a light-filled, spacious living room that flows effortlessly into the dining areaboth of which open onto a terrace offering breathtaking, uninterrupted views over Port Gallice. The kitchen, thoughtfully positioned, opens onto a shaded terrace.
Upstairs, the principal suite is a true retreat, complete with a luxurious bathroom, jacuzzi, and an exquisite dressing room crafted from fine woods. Two additional bedrooms, each with their own beautifully appointed bathrooms.
On the ground floor, a summer lounge provides a relaxed ambience, complemented by a second full kitchen. This level also features another splendid suite, along with a further bedroom and its own bathroom, ideal for guests or extended family.
The villa opens onto expansive terraces that are perfectly designed for entertaining, with elegant lounge areas, a heated swimming pool, and a charming summer bar.
j:translation_en.title: 5 bedroom luxury Villa for sale in Antibes, French Riviera - 131566311

The villa has 4 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom or shower, as well as an independent studio, a laundry room, a gym, a sauna, and a wine cellar. A large garage that can accommodate up to 3 cars is also available. The perfectly flat and usable garden extends over an area of 1840 m. From the upper floor, there is a beautiful view of the sea. This prestigious house is in perfect condition and presents no surprises. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (null)

j:translation_en.description: In exclusive, BD de Cambria, near to the university of letters. Very rare, most beautiful formel villa 183 square metres it was built in 1935 in cut stone. It's situated at 1.5 km from the Promenade des angle, the hospital L'Archet , and tram way. It's detached in excellent condition. It has a beautiful dining room living room with original wooden floors in excellent condition and high ceilings, the kitchen, which is 17 sq meters completely equipped, looks onto a big shaded terrace and from the kitchen there's a corridor that leads to a secondary WC. On the first floor is the main bedroom of 21 meaters with walk in wardrobe and leading onto it's own bathroom, there's a terrace with parshel sea view. There's a corridor with fitted wardrobes, two guest bedrooms and another bathroom. There's also a basement with windows of 34 square meters and a fully equipped bathroom, this space can be used as a play room, study room ect , the windows look onto a beautiful garden. The villa has a swimming pool of 10 by 4, in a beautiful garden surrounded by old trees. There's a parking space for 3 cars, 3 cellars and a technical room.

j:translation_en.description:
Co-exclusivity. Situated on the heights of Cannes' most coveted hill, this sumptuous property enjoys spectacular panoramic views over the bay, the Lrins islands and the Estrel massif.
Completely renovated in a contemporary Provencal style, the property combines refined decor, soft colors and top-of-the-range amenities to create a natural ambience in an idyllic setting representing the art of living in Provence.
The villa's interior and exterior design is dedicated to the comfort of its occupants.
First floor: entrance, master suite opening onto south-facing terrace with sea view, dressing room, bathroom, shower and toilet; second bedroom opening onto terrace with sea view, shower room and toilet; third bedroom opening onto terrace with sea view, dressing room, bathroom, separate toilet.
On the garden level: a vast living room with fireplace opening onto terrace, dining room opening onto terrace also leading onto covered terrace equipped with summer dining room and guest toilet, a beautiful kitchen with wine cellar opening onto terrace, a second fully equipped kitchen with laundry room, and a bedroom with shower room.
Staff house of approx. 117 m comprising a living room with kitchenette, three bedrooms, shower room and toilet.
Carport and garage. An independent bedroom with shower room is located on the pool level.
Set in beautifully structured landscaped grounds of approx. 7,700 m, the attractive pool area invites you to relax overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It features a covered terrace equipped with a lounge and summer kitchen with bar, shower and toilet. The infinity pool, which can be heated, includes a Jacuzzi. A fitness room with "Star Trac" equipment also boasts a sea view.

j:translation_en.description: A LIVING ARCHITECTURAL MASTERPIECE – TRULY ONE-OF-A-KIND IN PARIS Just steps from Place des Vosges, tucked away in a quiet and discreet cul-de-sac, lies this extraordinary private mansion of approx. 800 sqm, spread across five levels with a private lift, and completed by a duplex apartment connected to the main residence. A rare, majestic property — a perfect fusion between a Provençal farmhouse, a bourgeois country home, and a Parisian hôtel particulier. A place where timeless elegance meets vast, unobstructed space — a combination almost unheard of in central Paris today. A bucolic and elegant oasis in the heart of the Marais Behind a discreet façade lies a charming 48 sqm paved courtyard, with stone fountain, sunlit walls, cast iron lamppost, and a perched balcony — a true Provençal scene nestled in the capital. Inside, original materials have been carefully preserved: exposed beams, Versailles parquet, terracotta tiles, period fireplaces and refined wood panelling create a warm and authentic atmosphere. A private estate with limitless possibilities On five floors connected by a private elevator, the main residence features: • Grand reception rooms: living room with fireplace, wood-panelled boudoir, winter lounge, dining room • A modern kitchen with adjoining pantry • 9 bedrooms, including a master suite with balcony, bathroom and dressing • 12 bathrooms or shower rooms • A wellness level with heated indoor pool, counter-current swimming lane, sauna, gym, laundry, and guest suite The approx. 90 sqm duplex apartment, with two separate entrances (street and internal courtyard), is fully connected to the main house, making it ideal for guests, staff or a professional space. An inspiring and confidential property, meeting the highest standards This estate combines luxury, freedom and character, offering an ideal base for family life, artistic use, or a cultural foundation. Its exceptional scale, rare flexibility, and sought-after location make it one of the most unique assets on the Parisian market. Main Features: – Approx. 800 sqm total surface incl. 524 sqm under Carrez law – Layout: 5-level mansion + communicating duplex apartment – Private lift – 48 sqm paved courtyard with southern feel – 20 rooms total – 9 bedrooms – 12 bathrooms or shower rooms – Wellness area: pool, sauna, gym – Vaulted cellar approx. 34 sqm – DPE: Class D – Annual charges: €36,000 – Monthly rent (if rented): €50,000 excl. charges – Mixed use possible: private residence, secondary home, professional or cultural use Key strengths & rare potential: • Prime location – Marais / Place des Vosges • Unique ambiance – heritage, lifestyle, and timeless elegance • Extremely confidential – impressive volumes – outstanding value potential • Communicating loft – ideal for staff, guests or flexible use • Freedom of use – family estate, artistic house, foundation HQ... • A unique life setting in Paris – where discretion meets true luxury • Exceptional rental investment – ideal for high-end furnished leasing or prestige events • Unlimited transformation potential – gallery, showroom, creative hub or tailor-made residence Target audiences: • Discerning families seeking a unique residence in Paris • International buyers looking for a discreet and iconic address • Art collectors, foundations, publishing or production houses • Investors searching for a rare heritage asset with flexible use and high potential
j:translation_en.title: Luxury House for sale in Bastille, Rpublique, Nation-Alexandre Dumas, France - 131621622

j:translation_en.description:
This modern house is a true architectural masterpiece, with its clean lines and high-end finishes. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the outdoor environment.

The villa features a spectacular master suite, complete with a private balcony offering stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The other bedrooms are also spacious and bright, providing comfortable space for family and guests. The main living area opens onto a sunny terrace, perfect for relaxing and outdoor entertaining.

The true centerpiece of the villa is its infinity pool, which offers spectacular views of the horizon. And for breathtaking views, the rooftop provides a privileged space to admire sunsets and starry nights.
j:translation_en.title: Saint-Tropez villa

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette maison moderne est un véritable chef-d'œuvre architectural, avec ses lignes épurées et ses finitions haut de gamme. Les grandes baies vitrées inondent les espaces intérieurs de lumière naturelle, créant une atmosphère lumineuse et accueillante qui se fond harmonieusement avec l'environnement extérieur.

La villa dispose d'une suite parentale spectaculaire, avec un balcon privé offrant une vue imprenable sur le paysage environnant. Les autres chambres sont également spacieuses et lumineuses, offrant un espace confortable pour la famille et les invités. La pièce principale s'ouvre sur une terrasse ensoleillée, idéale pour se détendre et se divertir en plein air.

La véritable pièce maîtresse de la villa est sa piscine à débordement, qui offre une vue spectaculaire sur l'horizon. Et pour des vues à couper le souffle, le rooftop offre un espace privilégié pour admirer les couchers de soleil et les nuits étoilées.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa en rose

j:translation_fr.description:
Résidence baignée de lumière naturelle, offrant un cadre de vie moderne et raffiné. Avec ses grandes baies vitrées et sa hauteur sous plafond généreuse, cette maison offre une atmosphère lumineuse et aérée où le confort et le style se rencontrent harmonieusement.

L'intérieur de la villa est un véritable chef-d'œuvre de design contemporain, avec des espaces ouverts et fluides qui invitent à la convivialité et à la détente.

Située au cœur d'un quartier paisible, cette villa offre une escapade urbaine idéale pour ceux qui recherchent la tranquillité et la modernité.
