j:translation_en.description:
Residence bathed in natural light, offering a modern and refined living environment. With its large windows and generous ceiling height, this house provides a bright and airy atmosphere where comfort and style harmoniously converge.

The interior of the villa is a true masterpiece of contemporary design, with open and fluid spaces that invite conviviality and relaxation.

Located in the heart of a peaceful neighborhood, this villa offers an ideal urban getaway for those seeking tranquility and modernity.
j:translation_en.title: Incredible bright house

j:translation_fr.description:
Villa moderne d'exception, offrant un cadre de vie luxueux et contemporain avec une vue imprenable sur les environs. Cette grande maison est un chef-d'œuvre architectural, avec ses lignes épurées et ses finitions haut de gamme, offrant une esthétique moderne et élégante. Située sur une colline, cette villa offre une vue à couper le souffle sur la ville et les montagnes environnantes.

L'intérieur de la villa est un hymne à la modernité et au confort, avec des espaces de vie spacieux et lumineux conçus pour répondre aux besoins du mode de vie contemporain. Les grandes baies vitrées inondent les espaces intérieurs de lumière naturelle, créant une atmosphère chaleureuse et accueillante. Les chambres, décorées avec goût dans un style moderne et élégant, offrent un havre de paix pour se retirer en toute tranquillité.

Que ce soit pour admirer les couchers de soleil spectaculaires ou simplement se relaxer en plein air, cette villa offre un cadre idéal pour profiter de la beauté de la nature environnante.
j:translation_fr.title: Grande maison avec vue poustouflante

j:translation_en.description:
Exceptional modern villa, offering a luxurious and contemporary living space with stunning views of the surroundings. This grand house is an architectural masterpiece, with its sleek lines and high-end finishes, providing a modern and elegant aesthetic. Perched on a hill, this villa offers breathtaking views of the city and the surrounding mountains.

The interior of the villa is a celebration of modernity and comfort, with spacious and bright living spaces designed to meet the needs of contemporary living. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a warm and inviting atmosphere. The tastefully decorated bedrooms in a modern and elegant style offer a peaceful retreat for quiet relaxation.

Whether it's to admire the spectacular sunsets or simply relax outdoors, this villa offers an ideal setting to enjoy the beauty of the surrounding nature.
j:translation_en.title: Grand house with breathtaking view

j:translation_fr.description:
Conçue pour s'intégrer harmonieusement à son cadre boisé, cette maison contemporaine offre un refuge de calme et de sérénité loin de l'agitation de la vie urbaine. Les matériaux naturels et les lignes épurées de l'architecture soulignent l'élégance discrète de cette résidence unique.

L'intérieur de la villa est un véritable hymne à la modernité et au confort. Les espaces de vie lumineux et aérés sont idéalement agencés pour profiter au maximum de la lumière naturelle et des vues apaisantes sur la forêt environnante. Les chambres, minimalistes et accueillantes, offrent un espace de repos paisible, tandis que les espaces de vie conviviaux sont parfaits pour se retrouver en famille ou entre amis.

Des promenades dans la forêt aux pique-niques paisibles près de la rivière voisine, chaque jour dans cette maison d'architecte est une invitation à la détente et à la contemplation de la beauté de la nature.
j:translation_fr.title: Architecture contemporaine au cur de la nature

j:translation_en.description:
Designed to seamlessly blend into its wooded surroundings, this contemporary home offers a refuge of calm and serenity away from the hustle and bustle of urban life. Natural materials and clean lines of the architecture underscore the understated elegance of this unique residence.

The interior of the villa is a true ode to modernity and comfort. Bright and airy living spaces are thoughtfully arranged to maximize natural light and soothing views of the surrounding forest. The minimalist and welcoming bedrooms offer a peaceful resting space, while the communal living areas are perfect for gathering with family or friends.

From walks in the forest to peaceful picnics by the nearby river, each day in this architect-designed home is an invitation to relaxation and contemplation of the beauty of nature.
j:translation_en.title: Contemporary architecture in the heart of nature

j:translation_en.description:
Set within a private 15-acre estate, this 10,000 sq.ft. Georgian-style manor, originally built in 1928 and fully restored in 2020, embodies the timeless elegance of the East Coast. The residence features 8 en-suite bedrooms, 10 bathrooms, a wood-paneled library, multiple formal living rooms with period fireplaces, and a chef’s kitchen with a Calacatta marble island.

The grounds include a heated swimming pool, a fully equipped summer pool house, a natural grass tennis court, a 6-car garage, and a restored Victorian greenhouse. Located just 40 minutes from Manhattan, this rare offering blends prestige, privacy, and refined living.
j:translation_en.title: Historic Manor in Greenwich, Connecticut

j:translation_fr.description:
Nichée dans un parc privé de plus de 6 hectares, cette propriété néo-géorgienne de 1 000 m², construite en 1928 et entièrement rénovée en 2020, incarne l'élégance intemporelle de la côte Est. Le manoir compte 8 chambres en suite, 10 salles de bains, une bibliothèque lambrissée, plusieurs salons avec cheminées d'époque, et une cuisine de chef avec ilot central en marbre Calacatta.

Le domaine comprend une piscine chauffée, un pool house avec cuisine d’été, un court de tennis en gazon naturel, un garage pour 6 véhicules, et une serre victorienne restaurée. À 40 minutes de Manhattan, ce bien rare combine intimité, prestige et confort absolu.
j:translation_fr.title: Manoir historique Greenwich, Connecticut

j:translation_en.description:
Occupying the top three floors of a landmark building across from Central Park, this 7,300 sq.ft. penthouse offers breathtaking views of the park and Midtown skyline. The apartment includes 5 bedrooms, 7 bathrooms, a private screening room, a wood-paneled study, and a grand living room with 15-ft ceilings.

The landscaped 2,700 sq.ft. rooftop terrace features a jacuzzi, outdoor fireplace lounge, summer kitchen, and a private sky garden. The building offers 24/7 doorman service, a private secured garage, and direct elevator access to all levels.
j:translation_en.title: Triplex Penthouse with Private Rooftop Upper East Side, Manhattan

j:translation_fr.description:
Occupant les trois derniers étages d’un immeuble haussmannien face à Central Park, ce penthouse de 680 m² offre des vues spectaculaires sur les arbres du parc et la skyline de Midtown. L’appartement comprend 5 chambres, 7 salles de bains, une salle de projection privée, un bureau bibliothèque, et un salon principal avec 4,5 m de hauteur sous plafond.

Le rooftop paysager de 250 m² est équipé d’un jacuzzi, d’un espace lounge avec cheminée extérieure, d’une cuisine d’été et d’un jardin suspendu. L’immeuble dispose d’un portier 24/7, d’un garage privatif sécurisé, et d’un accès direct par ascenseur privé.
j:translation_fr.title: Penthouse triplex avec rooftop priv Manhattan, Upper East Side

bien-immobilier-5.address: 88 West Shore Drive, Bolton Landing, NY 12814

j:translation_en.description:
This striking 9,700 sq.ft. contemporary manor offers panoramic lake views and private dock access on Lake George. It boasts 6 luxurious suites, a gym, wellness spa with sauna and steam room, a state-of-the-art home theater, and a glass wine cellar.

Outdoor amenities include a heated infinity pool, a pool house with bar, a lit tennis court, panoramic terrace, and a 4-car garage with Tesla charging station. An ideal primary residence or refined retreat in nature.
j:translation_en.title: Lakefront Contemporary Estate Lake George, New York

j:translation_fr.description:
Ce spectaculaire manoir contemporain de 900 m² offre une vue panoramique sur le lac George, avec un accès direct à un quai privé. La maison comprend 6 suites, une salle de sport, un spa avec hammam et sauna, un home cinéma, et une cave à vin vitrée.

À l’extérieur : une piscine à débordement chauffée, un pool house avec bar, un court de tennis éclairé, une terrasse panoramique et un garage pour 4 voitures avec station de recharge Tesla. Parfait pour une résidence principale ou secondaire.
j:translation_fr.title: Manoir contemporain en bord de lac Lake George, tat de New York

j:translation_en.description:
Located in the heart of historic Back Bay, this 5,600 sq.ft. duplex occupies the top two floors of a prestigious landmark building overlooking the Public Garden. It features 4 bedrooms, a dramatic double-height living room with fireplace, an open-concept Poggenpohl kitchen, and a private gallery walkway.

The 1,900 sq.ft. terrace includes a heated lap pool, covered outdoor lounge, and custom-designed landscaping. The building provides concierge service, private parking, residents-only fitness center, and secure elevator access to the residence.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Duplex Residence in Boston Back Bay

j:translation_fr.description:
Situé au cœur du quartier historique de Back Bay, ce duplex de 520 m² occupe les deux derniers étages d’un immeuble emblématique face aux jardins publics. Il offre 4 chambres, un double séjour cathédrale avec cheminée, une cuisine ouverte Poggenpohl, et une galerie d’art suspendue.

La terrasse de 180 m² est aménagée avec une piscine de nage chauffée, un salon extérieur couvert, et des plantations sur-mesure. Résidence sécurisée avec conciergerie, parking privé, salle de sport réservée aux résidents, et accès direct par ascenseur sécurisé.
j:translation_fr.title: Rsidence de prestige Boston Back Bay.

j:translation_en.description: Located in a prestigious gated community in Florida, this Mediterranean-inspired mansion offers elegant architecture and resort-style living. The property spans more than 8,500 square feet and features 7 bedrooms, each with en-suite bathrooms, as well as multiple lounges and a formal dining room. A gourmet kitchen, wine cellar, and home theater complete the interior amenities. Outside, enjoy the heated pool, jacuzzi, outdoor kitchen, and a covered lanai with fireplace. Lush landscaping and palm-lined walkways add to the tropical ambiance, creating the perfect luxury retreat for year-round enjoyment.
j:translation_en.title: Mediterranean Mansion in Exclusive Community Antonioport, Florida

j:translation_en.description: Set on 20 acres of rolling countryside in Virginia, this equestrian estate combines luxury living with world-class facilities. The main residence includes 5 bedrooms, vaulted ceilings, hardwood floors, and a gourmet kitchen. The property also features an 8-stall barn, tack room, indoor arena, and fenced paddocks. A guest cottage, pool with cabana, and private trails complete the offering. Whether you're a breeder, rider, or investor, this property delivers unmatched equestrian potential. Additionally, the estate is ideally suited for hosting equestrian events or retreats, offering peace, space, and privacy.
j:translation_en.title: Equestrian Estate with Premium Facilities South Danny, Virginia

j:translation_en.description: This breathtaking modern estate nestled in the hills of California redefines contemporary luxury. With over 10,000 square feet of living space, the home features soaring ceilings, expansive glass walls, and seamless indoor-outdoor living. The main level includes a grand foyer, formal living room with custom stone fireplace, open-plan gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining area overlooking the infinity-edge pool. Upstairs, the master suite offers a private terrace, spa-like bathroom, and walk-in closets. The home also includes a fitness center, cinema room, wine cellar, and guest wing. Ideal for those seeking elegance, space, and ultimate privacy.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Estate with Infinity Pool Lake Tahoe, North Carolina

j:translation_en.name: Luxe - US West Coast

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette villa incarne le summum du luxe contemporain, offrant un cadre de vie moderne et raffiné avec une touche de sophistication. Nichée sur une colline surplombant la mer, cette maison contemporaine offre une vue imprenable sur l'horizon azuré et le bleu infini de la Méditerranée. Avec son design et ses lignes épurés, cette villa est un véritable chef-d'œuvre architectural, offrant une expérience de vie incomparable dans un cadre spectaculaire.

L'intérieur de la villa est un mariage parfait entre esthétique moderne et confort luxueux. Les espaces de vie lumineux et aérés sont idéalement agencés pour profiter au maximum de la vue imprenable sur la mer, tandis que les finitions haut de gamme ajoutent une touche de sophistication à chaque pièce.
j:translation_fr.title: Summum du luxe amricain

j:translation_en.description:
This villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury, offering a modern and refined living environment with a touch of sophistication. Perched on a hill overlooking the sea, this contemporary home boasts stunning views of the azure horizon and the endless blue of the Pacific ocean. With its sleek design and clean lines, this villa is a true architectural masterpiece, providing an unparalleled living experience in a spectacular setting.

The interior of the villa is a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and luxurious comfort. The bright and airy living spaces are thoughtfully arranged to make the most of the breathtaking sea views, while high-end finishes add a touch of sophistication to every room.
j:translation_en.title: Infinity pool villa in Santa Monica

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette villa post-moderne en bord de mer incarne le summum du luxe contemporain. Conçue avec une esthétique architecturale distinctive, cette résidence offre un équilibre parfait entre élégance et fonctionnalité.

Les espaces de vie lumineux et ouverts sont ornés de matériaux de qualité supérieure et de finitions élégantes, créant un cadre idéal pour se détendre et se divertir. Les vastes baies vitrées offrent une vue panoramique sur l'océan, tandis que les terrasses ensoleillées et la piscine à débordement invitent à profiter pleinement du climat méditerranéen.

Les cinq chambres spacieuses, chacune avec sa propre salle de bain, offrent un confort luxueux et une intimité totale pour les résidents et les invités.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa d'exception en bord de mer

j:translation_en.description:
This post-modern seaside villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury. Designed with a distinctive architectural aesthetic, this residence strikes a perfect balance between elegance and functionality.

The bright and open living spaces are adorned with premium materials and stylish finishes, creating an ideal setting for relaxation and entertainment. Expansive windows offer panoramic views of the ocean, while sunny terraces and the infinity pool beckon to fully enjoy the Mediterranean climate.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, provide luxurious comfort and complete privacy for residents and guests.
j:translation_en.title: Exceptional seaside villa

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette villa incarne l'essence même du design contemporain. Avec ses lignes épurées et sa façade en verre, cette maison éblouit dès le premier regard. Les grandes baies vitrées inondent les espaces intérieurs de lumière naturelle, créant une atmosphère chaleureuse et aérée qui se fond harmonieusement avec le paysage environnant.

Les cinq chambres spacieuses, chacune avec sa propre salle de bain, offrent un confort luxueux et une intimité totale pour les résidents et les invités.

Cette maison est conçue pour la vie en plein air. La terrasse expansive, avec son coin salon et son espace repas en plein air, est l'endroit parfait pour se détendre et profiter du soleil. Le jardin offre un cadre idyllique pour les activités en plein air et les moments de détente en famille.
j:translation_fr.title: Maison lumineuse avec vue panoramique

j:translation_en.description:
This villa epitomizes the essence of contemporary design. With its sleek lines and glass faade, this house dazzles at first sight. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a warm and airy atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the surrounding landscape.

The five spacious bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, offer luxurious comfort and total privacy for residents and guests.

This house is designed for outdoor living. The expansive terrace, with its seating area and outdoor dining space, is the perfect spot to relax and soak up the sun. The garden provides an idyllic setting for outdoor activities and family relaxation.
j:translation_en.title: Bright house with panoramic view

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette maison moderne est un véritable chef-d'œuvre architectural, avec ses lignes épurées et ses finitions haut de gamme. Les grandes baies vitrées inondent les espaces intérieurs de lumière naturelle, créant une atmosphère lumineuse et accueillante qui se fond harmonieusement avec l'environnement extérieur.

La villa dispose d'une suite parentale spectaculaire, avec un balcon privé offrant une vue imprenable sur le paysage environnant. Les autres chambres sont également spacieuses et lumineuses, offrant un espace confortable pour la famille et les invités. La pièce principale s'ouvre sur une terrasse ensoleillée, idéale pour se détendre et se divertir en plein air.

La véritable pièce maîtresse de la villa est sa piscine à débordement, qui offre une vue spectaculaire sur l'horizon. Et pour des vues à couper le souffle, le rooftop offre un espace privilégié pour admirer les couchers de soleil et les nuits étoilées.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa moderne rose, San Bernardino

j:translation_en.description:
This modern house is a true architectural masterpiece, with its clean lines and high-end finishes. Large windows flood the interior spaces with natural light, creating a bright and welcoming atmosphere that seamlessly blends with the outdoor environment.

The villa features a spectacular master suite, complete with a private balcony offering stunning views of the surrounding landscape. The other bedrooms are also spacious and bright, providing comfortable space for family and guests. The main living area opens onto a sunny terrace, perfect for relaxing and outdoor entertaining.

The true centerpiece of the villa is its infinity pool, which offers spectacular views of the horizon. And for breathtaking views, the rooftop provides a privileged space to admire sunsets and starry nights.
j:translation_en.title: Pink villa, modern style, San Bernardino

j:translation_en.description:
Set high above Sunset Plaza, this ultra-modern 700 sqm villa boasts breathtaking panoramic views of Los Angeles. It includes 5 bedrooms, an internal elevator, and luxury finishes such as polished concrete floors, a Gaggenau kitchen, and expansive glass walls.

Outdoor amenities feature an infinity pool overlooking the city, a rooftop with jacuzzi, a 4-car garage, and a glass-enclosed pool house. An architectural gem, perfectly suited for a life of privacy, elegance, and glamour.
j:translation_en.title: Hollywood Hills Architectural Villa with Rooftop & Sunset Views

j:translation_fr.description:
Perchée sur les hauteurs de Sunset Plaza, cette villa ultra-moderne de 460 m² offre un panorama spectaculaire sur Los Angeles. Elle dispose de 5 chambres, d’un ascenseur intérieur, et de finitions luxueuses : béton ciré, cuisine Gaggenau, et verrières XXL.

Les extérieurs comprennent une piscine à débordement surplombant la ville, un rooftop avec jacuzzi, un garage pour 4 véhicules, et un pool house vitré. Un bijou architectural, idéal pour une vie entre intimité et glamour.
j:translation_fr.title: Hollywood Hills Villa darchitecte avec rooftop & sunset views

j:translation_en.description:
Just minutes from downtown Palm Springs, this single-story designer residence offers 800 sqm of living space. Designed by an award-winning architect, it features 4 suites, an interior courtyard, and vast open spaces that flow seamlessly into the outdoors.

The 5,000 sqm lot includes an infinity pool, an outdoor spa, a lit tennis court, a 3-car garage, and an air-conditioned pool house. A home designed for relaxation and a refined desert lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: Palm Springs Modern Oasis in the Desert

j:translation_fr.description:
À quelques minutes du centre de Palm Springs, cette résidence design de plain-pied s'étend sur 800 m² habitables. Conçue par un architecte primé, elle comprend 4 suites, une cour intérieure, et de larges espaces ouverts sur l'extérieur.

Le terrain de 5 000 m² abrite une piscine à débordement, un spa extérieur, un court de tennis éclairé, un garage 3 voitures, et un pool house climatisé. Une résidence pensée pour la détente et l’art de vivre en plein désert.
j:translation_fr.title: Palm Springs Oasis moderne dans le dsert

j:translation_en.description:
Located on the prestigious Carbon Beach, this 5-bedroom property blends Californian charm with Mediterranean elegance. Every room offers direct ocean views and access to a spacious teak terrace.

The home features a heated swimming pool, a pool house with an outdoor kitchen, a private screening room, a sauna, and a separate guest studio. A private beach accessible from the garden and a double garage with an electric charging station enhance the comfort of this rare beachfront estate.
j:translation_en.title: Malibu On the cliff

j:translation_fr.description:
Située sur la prestigieuse Carbon Beach, cette propriété de 5 chambres combine charme californien et élégance méditerranéenne. Chaque pièce offre une vue directe sur l’océan et un accès à une grande terrasse en teck.

La maison comprend une piscine chauffée, un pool house avec cuisine extérieure, une salle de projection, un sauna et un studio indépendant. La plage privée accessible depuis le jardin et le garage double avec station de recharge électrique ajoutent au confort de cette demeure rare.
j:translation_fr.title: Malibu Villa sur la fallaise

j:translation_en.description:
Perched atop a private hillside, this stunning 1,200 sqm contemporary villa offers breathtaking views of Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Featuring 6 en-suite bedrooms, the property is distinguished by its grand volumes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and interior design that seamlessly blends Italian marble with exotic wood finishes.

The landscaped grounds, spanning over 4,000 sqm, include a striking infinity mirror pool, a fully equipped pool house, an outdoor lounge area with a fireplace, and a professional-grade tennis court. Additional features include a secure garage for 5 vehicles, a wine cellar, a private cinema, a fitness room, and a cutting-edge smart home system — all contributing to the uniqueness of this exceptional estate.
j:translation_en.title: Contemporary Villa in Beverly Hills Panoramic Views & Ultimate Luxury

j:translation_fr.description:
Nichée au sommet d’une colline privée, cette villa contemporaine de 1 200 m² offre une vue imprenable sur Los Angeles et l’océan Pacifique. Dotée de 6 chambres en suite, elle se distingue par ses volumes spectaculaires, ses baies vitrées toute hauteur, et une architecture intérieure mêlant marbre italien et bois exotique.

Le jardin paysager de plus de 4 000 m² accueille une piscine miroir à débordement, un pool house entièrement équipé, un espace lounge avec cheminée extérieure, et un court de tennis professionnel. Garage sécurisé pour 5 véhicules, cave à vin, home cinéma, salle de sport, et domotique haut de gamme complètent ce bien unique.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa contemporaine Beverly Hills Vue panoramique & luxe absolu

j:translation_en.description:
Magnificent property on the seafront of approximately 303 sqm with swimming pool, surrounded by south-facing terraces.
On the ground floor: an entrance, a double living room, a dining room, a kitchen and a scullery, a separate laundry room, guest toilets, an office, a large double bedroom with adjoining shower room and a private terrace separated.
On the first floor: master suite with bathroom and large dressing room, 2 double bedrooms each with private bathroom. All rooms enjoy stunning sea views from their balconies.
Outside: sunny terrace with solarium, pool house with kitchen, shower room and WC, mature planting.
Large parking lot for 5/6 cars.
A guest bedroom at pool-house level with a south-west facing shower room.
j:translation_en.title: 7 room luxury Villa in Malibu

j:translation_fr.description: Magnificent property on the seafront of approximately 303 sqm with swimming pool, surrounded by south-facing terraces. On the ground floor: an entrance, a double living room, a dining room, a kitchen and a scullery, a separate laundry room, guest toilets, an office, a large double bedroom with adjoining shower room and a private terrace separated. On the first floor: master suite with bathroom and large dressing room, 2 double bedrooms each with private bathroom. All rooms enjoy stunning sea views from their balconies. Outside: sunny terrace with solarium, pool house with kitchen, shower room and WC, mature planting. Large parking lot for 5/6 cars. A guest bedroom at pool-house level with a south-west facing shower room.
j:translation_fr.title: Duplex 300m2, piscine, Monterey

j:translation_en.description:
UZES
Historic center, a stone's throw from the Chteau Ducal known as Duch.
A prestigious and characterful apartment with a garden and an interior courtyard.
This exceptional apartment is located on the ground floor of an ISMH-listed private mansion dating from the 16th century with a superb private garden, its authenticity, refinement and elegance will seduce you.
Its surface area is 193 sqm + 68 sqm of private garden and 30 sqm of vaulted cellar.
By pushing the front door from the street you enter the hall of the private mansion and discover a superb ceremonial stone staircase with magnificent balusters which leads to the upper levels, a real favorite, then the courtyard square interior and the beautiful facades of the building with its caryatids.
The apartment is composed of a gallery entrance hall, a magnificent reception room with a surface area of 63.50 m2 with a high ceiling of approximately 6.50 meters, a beautiful Louis XV fireplace and a superb overmantel, two very large French doors giving access to the wooded garden on the south side, a kitchen with beautiful old elements, stone fireplace and bread oven which is fully equipped with high-end elements, steam oven etc..., three bedrooms including one with its dressing room and two bathrooms.
This very comfortable apartment benefits from underfloor heating.
It is in perfect condition, with very beautiful architectural elements and high quality services.
In absolute calm while being in the city center and a stone's throw from the Place aux Herbes, this apartment is ideal for various main residence or pied--terre projects.
Avignon TGV station 45 minutes away, Nmes airport 40 minutes away, A9 motorway 15 kilometers away
j:translation_en.title: 5 room luxury Apartment in Los Angeles

j:translation_en.description:
Magnificent private mansion of 296.09m Loi Carrez located on avenue Victor Hugo in a charming private villa, completely renovated by an architect.
It is composed as follows:
On the ground floor - An entrance - A workshop kitchen - A large dining room opening onto a pleasant courtyard - A bedroom with private shower room
On the first floor - A spacious double living room
On the second floor - A beautiful master suite with dressing rooms - A bathroom with shower and bathtub
On the upper floor - Two large bedrooms each with their own shower room. - A Roof top full sun without vis--vis.
In the English courtyard, with independent access, is a living room, as well as a large laundry room
A garden terrace is accessible at the front of the mansion, and a beautiful courtyard terrace at the back.
A large parking space is in front of the house in the private lane

j:translation_fr.description: Appartement 5 pièces àau coeur de Los Angeles. Un site d’exception sur les hauteurs préservées du Jahia Canyon, à seulement quelques minutes du port de plaisance et du centre historique de Bonifacio. Ici, ce n’est pas simplement un bien immobilier que vous découvrez, mais un panorama à couper le souffle, une véritable scène naturelle à 220°. Le terrain, d’une surface de près de 5600 m², constitue à lui seul une œuvre paysagère remarquable.  On y pénètre comme dans un domaine méditerranéen ancien, structuré autour de 68 oliviers centenaires qui trônent en majesté au cœur d’une oliveraie sculptée par des murets en pierre sèche de Bonifacio, évoquant l’authenticité du terroir insulaire. Figuiers, agrumes, senteurs du maquis... chaque essence ici semble avoir été choisie pour dialoguer avec la nature environnante. Ce terrain d’une beauté souveraine pourrait accueillir, si désiré, une installation discrète telle qu’un court de tennis ou un terrain de padel, sans altérer l’harmonie visuelle ni la quiétude des lieux. Ce que vous achetez avant tout ici, c’est une situation géographique exceptionnelle, une orientation idéale, un écrin de nature et de silence face à l’un des plus beaux panoramas maritimes de Corse. La maison, construite par un architecte dans les années 1990, s’intègre discrètement dans le paysage avec une architecture à niveaux décalés, pensée pour capter la lumière et s’ouvrir largement sur la mer. Elle développe environ 216 m² de surface brute (SHOB) répartis en cinq chambres, dont deux suites, un salon avec cheminée, une cuisine indépendante et conviviale, prolongée par une cuisine d’été couverte. Plusieurs terrasses suspendues, une piscine chauffée, un solarium, un four à bois et un barbecue viennent enrichir les espaces extérieurs. Un garage-atelier et un carport complètent ce cadre de vie.  vous l’assure, l’essentiel n’est pas là, la véritable valeur de ce bien réside dans sa parcelle, dans sa vue, dans sa rareté foncière.
j:translation_fr.title: 5 room luxury Apartment in LA

j:translation_en.description:
Located just a short walk from the center of the village of Gordes, this stunning dry-stone villa offers approximately 210 m of living space set on a landscaped plot of 2,929 m. Blending Provenal charm with contemporary comfort, the property enjoys a peaceful setting with open views of the Luberon mountains and surrounding hills.
The entrance opens onto a spacious 25 m hall, leading to bright living areas. The 35 m living and dining room opens onto a south-facing terrace, perfect for enjoying the Provenal climate. The generous 34 m kitchen is fully equipped and features a central dining area and quality, characterful furnishings. Three bedrooms are located on the ground floor, each with its own en-suite shower room. One of them has direct access to a private terrace, creating a secluded and peaceful retreat.
Upstairs, two additional bedrooms share a shower room, ideal for children or guests. The house is designed throughout to offer optimal comfort, whether as a main residence or a holiday home.
Outside, several terraces offer different exposures and atmospheres within the carefully landscaped garden. A large heated swimming pool fits harmoniously into the natural setting, bordered by wooden decking, shaded areas, and a delightful ptanque court for moments of conviviality. A well, a borehole, and an irrigation system complete the outdoor features, ensuring easy garden maintenance and autonomous water supply.
The property also includes an electric gate, an alarm system, and elegant outdoor lighting, ensuring both comfort and security. The garden, planted with Mediterranean species, offers great privacy while allowing the view to unfold over the hills of the Luberon.
This property is a rare opportunity in one of the most sought-after villages in Provence. Charm, comfort, and authenticity come together here in perfect harmony to offer an exceptional quality of life. For further information or to arrange a viewing, please contact us.
j:translation_en.title: 9 room luxury Villa for sale in Long Beach, CA

j:translation_en.description: This 12-room bastide. constructed with traditional high-quality materials. features several spacious and bright living areas spanning a magnificent 565m. It is a wonderful property for hosting family. friends. and business associates. This Provencal bastide is situated in the 'Plaine des Maures' nature reserve. on 8.6 hectares of land. including 5.4 hectares of leased AOC Ctes de Provence vineyards. Ground floor: An impressive living/dining room of 90 m with stunning views over the garden and vineyards. The large fireplace and beams create a welcoming ambiance. The second living room. measuring 31 m. is cozy and also features a fireplace. There is a dining room. a large 47 m fitted kitchen. 3 bedrooms with en-suite bathrooms. and 2 offices. 1st floor: 3 bedrooms with shower rooms and 1 office. This prestigious residence also includes 2 large garages with space for 6 cars. as well as a 170 m pool-house (with living room. bedroom. kitchen. and bathroom) adjacent to a swimming pool measuring 6m by 12m and a Jacuzzi for relaxing and enjoying sunny days with breathtaking views over the vineyards. This exceptional property offers an idyllic setting for nature and wine lovers and has great potential for further development. Please contact us for further information or to schedule a viewing.
j:translation_en.title: 12 room beach Villa for sale in South LA

M-OI Saint-Raphal offers for sale this magnificent luxury villa. The address of the property, the virtual visit video and all the financial information are available on request.
As soon as you enter you will be captivated by the beauty of the place. A majestic portal allowing the house to be sheltered from view. A sumptuous entrance giving way to a magnificent bright living room, decorated with great taste. The bay windows open onto a superb terrace with an infinity pool. Multiple relaxation areas to satisfy the wishes of each member of the family: living room, dining room, superb dining kitchen, patio, pool house...
The house consists of 5 bedrooms, 4 of which are en suite with dressing room, and bathroom, 4 are on one level. For the fifth bedroom, parental space, you will discover a full floor with office, library, workshop, dressing room and bathroom opening onto a second terrace with a full sea view!
From this terrace you can access a rooftop!
A garage that can accommodate 4 vehicles, a basketball court and several car parks are available

j:translation_en.description:
Luxuary villa located in Vieil Antibes
Tucked away on the gentle, west-facing slope of the prestigious Cap dAntibes, this elegant Belle poque villa enjoys an enviable location just a short stroll from the soft, sandy beaches, the lively Port Gallice, and the renowned restaurants of Juan-les-Pins. Set within beautifully landscaped, level grounds of 2,408 square metres, the property offers both privacy and proximity to the sea, with two separate entrances: a private pathway leading directly towards the coastline, and a grand main entrance graced by a majestic staircase.
The villa spans a generous 363 square metres and exudes timeless charm and sophistication. The interior welcomes you with a light-filled, spacious living room that flows effortlessly into the dining areaboth of which open onto a terrace offering breathtaking, uninterrupted views over Port Gallice. The kitchen, thoughtfully positioned, opens onto a shaded terrace.
Upstairs, the principal suite is a true retreat, complete with a luxurious bathroom, jacuzzi, and an exquisite dressing room crafted from fine woods. Two additional bedrooms, each with their own beautifully appointed bathrooms.
On the ground floor, a summer lounge provides a relaxed ambience, complemented by a second full kitchen. This level also features another splendid suite, along with a further bedroom and its own bathroom, ideal for guests or extended family.
The villa opens onto expansive terraces that are perfectly designed for entertaining, with elegant lounge areas, a heated swimming pool, and a charming summer bar.
j:translation_en.title: 5 bedroom House in Silicon Valley

j:translation_en.description: This prestigious villa is located in the quiet and sought-after residential area of Cap-Ferrat, in close proximity to the famous Grand Htel Four Seasons. It consists of three levels, with a large living/dining room with a fireplace, opening onto a spacious and comfortable terrace. The villa has 4 bedrooms, each with its own bathroom or shower, as well as an independent studio, a laundry room, a gym, a sauna, and a wine cellar. A large garage that can accommodate up to 3 cars is also available. The perfectly flat and usable garden extends over an area of 1840 m. From the upper floor, there is a beautiful view of the sea. The South and West exposure allows for ideal sunlight. Finally, a beautiful swimming pool is located in extension of the living room terrace. This prestigious house is in perfect condition and presents no surprises. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (null)

j:translation_en.description: In exclusive, BD de Cambria, near to the university of letters. Very rare, most beautiful formel villa 183 square metres it was built in 1935 in cut stone. It's situated at 1.5 km from the Promenade des angle, the hospital L'Archet , and tram way. It's detached in excellent condition. It has a beautiful dining room living room with original wooden floors in excellent condition and high ceilings, the kitchen, which is 17 sq meters completely equipped, looks onto a big shaded terrace and from the kitchen there's a corridor that leads to a secondary WC. On the first floor is the main bedroom of 21 meaters with walk in wardrobe and leading onto it's own bathroom, there's a terrace with parshel sea view. There's a corridor with fitted wardrobes, two guest bedrooms and another bathroom. There's also a basement with windows of 34 square meters and a fully equipped bathroom, this space can be used as a play room, study room ect , the windows look onto a beautiful garden. The villa has a swimming pool of 10 by 4, in a beautiful garden surrounded by old trees. There's a parking space for 3 cars, 3 cellars and a technical room.

j:translation_en.description:
Sole agent : The Magrey & Sons group is pleased to present for sale a splendid property of approx 480 sqm in the heart of a magnificent flat landscaped garden overlooking one of the most popular hills of Mougins near golf courses, international schools and of the fine sand beaches of Cannes.
Nestled in absolute calm, this sumptuous recently designed bastide (still under ten-year warranty) will immerse you in the heart of our charming Provence with its architecture combining noble stones, solid parquet, large volumes and large openings letting in light.
The charm of the interiors is enhanced by a splendid garden of 3,300 sqm in the colors of the South between olive trees, lavender and cypresses allowing you to enjoy the heated swimming pool and the pool house around a barbecue with friends in an idyllic setting.
This favorite property with 5 en-suite bedrooms is very pleasant to live in since it offers a vast space on one level as well as a peaceful living environment thanks to its fluid distribution, its large spaces inspiring freedom and conviviality, as well as its services since you will find a games room, a real cinema room, a very efficient home automation system, a heated swimming pool, a summer kitchen, a perimeter alarm, a double closed garage as well as a large car park. tat des risques et pollution: ralis (2023-06-28)
j:translation_en.title: Sacramento 7 room luxury Villa

Nestled in absolute calm, this sumptuous recently designed bastide (still under ten-year warranty) will immerse you in the heart of our charming Provence with its architecture combining noble stones, solid parquet, large volumes and large openings letting in light. The charm of the interiors is enhanced by a splendid garden of 3,300 sqm in the colors of the South between olive trees, lavender and cypresses allowing you to enjoy the heated swimming pool and the pool house around a barbecue with friends in an idyllic setting. This favorite property with 5 en-suite bedrooms is very pleasant to live in since it offers a vast space on one level as well as a peaceful living environment thanks to its fluid distribution, its large spaces inspiring freedom and conviviality, as well as its services since you will find a games room, a real cinema room, a very efficient home automation system, a heated swimming pool, a summer kitchen, a perimeter alarm, a double closed garage as well as a large car park. État des risques et pollution: réalisé (2023-06-28)
j:translation_fr.title: Sacramento. Villa luxueuse 7 pices

j:translation_en.description: In the heart of SF, in one of the most beautiful bourgeois buildings, we offer you a rare corner apartment of 280 m², located on the top floor. This unique living space stands out with its 7 windows on the façade, providing an unobstructed view of the coulée verte. You will be charmed by the exceptional brightness that floods each room, creating a warm and welcoming atmosphere. The apartment also features 3 balconies, perfect for enjoying the gentle Nice evenings, as well as a terrace at the back, ideal for moments of relaxation in complete privacy. Don’t miss this rare opportunity to acquire an exceptional property in a privileged setting. Contact us today to arrange a visit and discover the full potential of this unique apartment!
j:translation_en.title: 2 bedroom Flat for sale in San Francisco

j:translation_en.description:
Co-exclusivity. Situated on the heights of Cannes' most coveted hill, this sumptuous property enjoys spectacular panoramic views over the bay, the Lrins islands and the Estrel massif.
Completely renovated in a contemporary Provencal style, the property combines refined decor, soft colors and top-of-the-range amenities to create a natural ambience in an idyllic setting representing the art of living in Provence.
The villa's interior and exterior design is dedicated to the comfort of its occupants.
First floor: entrance, master suite opening onto south-facing terrace with sea view, dressing room, bathroom, shower and toilet; second bedroom opening onto terrace with sea view, shower room and toilet; third bedroom opening onto terrace with sea view, dressing room, bathroom, separate toilet.
On the garden level: a vast living room with fireplace opening onto terrace, dining room opening onto terrace also leading onto covered terrace equipped with summer dining room and guest toilet, a beautiful kitchen with wine cellar opening onto terrace, a second fully equipped kitchen with laundry room, and a bedroom with shower room.
Staff house of approx. 117 m comprising a living room with kitchenette, three bedrooms, shower room and toilet.
Carport and garage. An independent bedroom with shower room is located on the pool level.
Set in beautifully structured landscaped grounds of approx. 7,700 m, the attractive pool area invites you to relax overlooking the Mediterranean Sea. It features a covered terrace equipped with a lounge and summer kitchen with bar, shower and toilet. The infinity pool, which can be heated, includes a Jacuzzi. A fitness room with "Star Trac" equipment also boasts a sea view.
j:translation_en.title: Stunning Villa for sale in SAnta Monica

j:translation_en.description:
A LIVING ARCHITECTURAL MASTERPIECE – TRULY ONE-OF-A-KIND IN SAN FRANCISCO

Just steps from Place des Vosges, tucked away in a quiet and discreet cul-de-sac, lies this extraordinary private mansion of approx. 800 sqm, spread across five levels with a private lift, and completed by a duplex apartment connected to the main residence. A rare, majestic property — a perfect fusion between a Provençal farmhouse, a bourgeois country home, and a Parisian hôtel particulier. A place where timeless elegance meets vast, unobstructed space — a combination almost unheard of in central Paris today. A bucolic and elegant oasis in the heart of the Marais Behind a discreet façade lies a charming 48 sqm paved courtyard, with stone fountain, sunlit walls, cast iron lamppost, and a perched balcony — a true Provençal scene nestled in the capital. Inside, original materials have been carefully preserved: exposed beams, Versailles parquet, terracotta tiles, period fireplaces and refined wood panelling create a warm and authentic atmosphere. A private estate with limitless possibilities On five floors connected by a private elevator, the main residence features: • Grand reception rooms: living room with fireplace, wood-panelled boudoir, winter lounge, dining room • A modern kitchen with adjoining pantry • 9 bedrooms, including a master suite with balcony, bathroom and dressing • 12 bathrooms or shower rooms • A wellness level with heated indoor pool, counter-current swimming lane, sauna, gym, laundry, and guest suite The approx. 90 sqm duplex apartment, with two separate entrances (street and internal courtyard), is fully connected to the main house, making it ideal for guests, staff or a professional space. An inspiring and confidential property, meeting the highest standards This estate combines luxury, freedom and character, offering an ideal base for family life, artistic use, or a cultural foundation. Its exceptional scale, rare flexibility, and sought-after location make it one of the most unique assets on the Parisian market. Main Features: – Approx. 800 sqm total surface incl. 524 sqm under Carrez law – Layout: 5-level mansion + communicating duplex apartment – Private lift – 48 sqm paved courtyard with southern feel – 20 rooms total – 9 bedrooms – 12 bathrooms or shower rooms – Wellness area: pool, sauna, gym – Vaulted cellar approx. 34 sqm – DPE: Class D – Annual charges: €36,000 – Monthly rent (if rented): €50,000 excl. charges – Mixed use possible: private residence, secondary home, professional or cultural use Key strengths & rare potential: • Prime location – Marais / Place des Vosges • Unique ambiance – heritage, lifestyle, and timeless elegance • Extremely confidential – impressive volumes – outstanding value potential • Communicating loft – ideal for staff, guests or flexible use • Freedom of use – family estate, artistic house, foundation HQ... • A unique life setting in Paris – where discretion meets true luxury • Exceptional rental investment – ideal for high-end furnished leasing or prestige events • Unlimited transformation potential – gallery, showroom, creative hub or tailor-made residence Target audiences: • Discerning families seeking a unique residence in Paris • International buyers looking for a discreet and iconic address • Art collectors, foundations, publishing or production houses • Investors searching for a rare heritage asset with flexible use and high potential To schedule a private viewing or receive a complete file, please contact me directly. Mathieu – Partner at Gallant Properties +33 (0) 7 83 16 84 05 – mathieu@gallant-properties.com Luxury Real Estate – Throughout France État des risques et pollution: réalisé (null)

j:translation_fr.title: Painted Lady maison typique de Sans Francisco

j:translation_en.description:
Located on the prestigious Carbon Beach, this 5-bedroom property blends Californian charm with Mediterranean elegance. Every room offers direct ocean views and access to a spacious teak terrace.

The home features a heated swimming pool, a pool house with an outdoor kitchen, a private screening room, a sauna, and a separate guest studio. A private beach accessible from the garden and a double garage with an electric charging station enhance the comfort of this rare beachfront estate.
j:translation_en.title: Malibu Beachfront Villa with Mediterranean Style

j:translation_fr.description:
Située sur la prestigieuse Carbon Beach, cette propriété de 5 chambres combine charme californien et élégance méditerranéenne. Chaque pièce offre une vue directe sur l’océan et un accès à une grande terrasse en teck.

La maison comprend une piscine chauffée, un pool house avec cuisine extérieure, une salle de projection, un sauna et un studio indépendant. La plage privée accessible depuis le jardin et le garage double avec station de recharge électrique ajoutent au confort de cette demeure rare.
j:translation_fr.title: Malibu Villa mditerranenne sur la plage

j:translation_en.description:
Perched atop a private hillside, this stunning 1,200 sqm contemporary villa offers breathtaking views of Los Angeles and the Pacific Ocean. Featuring 6 en-suite bedrooms, the property is distinguished by its grand volumes, floor-to-ceiling windows, and interior design that seamlessly blends Italian marble with exotic wood finishes.

The landscaped grounds, spanning over 4,000 sqm, include a striking infinity mirror pool, a fully equipped pool house, an outdoor lounge area with a fireplace, and a professional-grade tennis court. Additional features include a secure garage for 5 vehicles, a wine cellar, a private cinema, a fitness room, and a cutting-edge smart home system — all contributing to the uniqueness of this exceptional estate.
j:translation_en.title: Panoramic Views, Sullivan Canyon, LA

j:translation_fr.description:
Nichée au sommet d’une colline privée, cette villa contemporaine de 1 200 m² offre une vue imprenable sur Los Angeles et l’océan Pacifique. Dotée de 6 chambres en suite, elle se distingue par ses volumes spectaculaires, ses baies vitrées toute hauteur, et une architecture intérieure mêlant marbre italien et bois exotique.

Le jardin paysager de plus de 4 000 m² accueille une piscine miroir à débordement, un pool house entièrement équipé, un espace lounge avec cheminée extérieure, et un court de tennis professionnel. Garage sécurisé pour 5 véhicules, cave à vin, home cinéma, salle de sport, et domotique haut de gamme complètent ce bien unique.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa en hauteur dans Sullivan Canyon, LA

j:translation_en.description:
Set high above Sunset Plaza, this ultra-modern 700 sqm villa boasts breathtaking panoramic views of Los Angeles. It includes 5 bedrooms, an internal elevator, and luxury finishes such as polished concrete floors, a Gaggenau kitchen, and expansive glass walls.

Outdoor amenities feature an infinity pool overlooking the city, a rooftop with jacuzzi, a 4-car garage, and a glass-enclosed pool house. An architectural gem, perfectly suited for a life of privacy, elegance, and glamour.
j:translation_en.title: Hollywood Hills Architectural Villa with Rooftop & Sunset Views

j:translation_fr.description:
Perchée sur les hauteurs de Sunset Plaza, cette villa ultra-moderne de 460 m² offre un panorama spectaculaire sur Los Angeles. Elle dispose de 5 chambres, d’un ascenseur intérieur, et de finitions luxueuses : béton ciré, cuisine Gaggenau, et verrières XXL.

Les extérieurs comprennent une piscine à débordement surplombant la ville, un rooftop avec jacuzzi, un garage pour 4 véhicules, et un pool house vitré. Un bijou architectural, idéal pour une vie entre intimité et glamour.
j:translation_fr.title: Hollywood Hills Villa darchitecte avec rooftop & sunset views

j:translation_en.description:
Just minutes from downtown Palm Springs, this single-story designer residence offers 800 sqm of living space. Designed by an award-winning architect, it features 4 suites, an interior courtyard, and vast open spaces that flow seamlessly into the outdoors.

The 5,000 sqm lot includes an infinity pool, an outdoor spa, a lit tennis court, a 3-car garage, and an air-conditioned pool house. A home designed for relaxation and a refined desert lifestyle.
j:translation_en.title: Palm Springs Modern Oasis in the Desert

j:translation_fr.description:
À quelques minutes du centre de Palm Springs, cette résidence design de plain-pied s'étend sur 800 m² habitables. Conçue par un architecte primé, elle comprend 4 suites, une cour intérieure, et de larges espaces ouverts sur l'extérieur.

Le terrain de 5 000 m² abrite une piscine à débordement, un spa extérieur, un court de tennis éclairé, un garage 3 voitures, et un pool house climatisé. Une résidence pensée pour la détente et l’art de vivre en plein désert.
j:translation_fr.title: Palm Springs Oasis moderne dans le dsert

j:translation_en.description:
This villa embodies the epitome of contemporary luxury, offering a modern and refined living environment with a touch of sophistication. Perched on a hill overlooking the sea, this contemporary home boasts stunning views of the azure horizon and the endless blue of the Mediterranean. With its sleek design and clean lines, this villa is a true architectural masterpiece, providing an unparalleled living experience in a spectacular setting.

The interior of the villa is a perfect blend of modern aesthetics and luxurious comfort. The bright and airy living spaces are thoughtfully arranged to make the most of the breathtaking sea views, while high-end finishes add a touch of sophistication to every room.
j:translation_en.title: Deep south style villa

j:translation_fr.description:
Cette villa incarne le summum du luxe contemporain, offrant un cadre de vie moderne et raffiné avec une touche de sophistication. Nichée sur une colline surplombant la mer, cette maison contemporaine offre une vue imprenable sur l'horizon azuré et le bleu infini du Pacifique. Avec son design et ses lignes épurés, cette villa est un véritable chef-d'œuvre architectural, offrant une expérience de vie incomparable dans un cadre spectaculaire.

L'intérieur de la villa est un mariage parfait entre esthétique moderne et confort luxueux. Les espaces de vie lumineux et aérés sont idéalement agencés pour profiter au maximum de la vue imprenable sur la mer, tandis que les finitions haut de gamme ajoutent une touche de sophistication à chaque pièce.
j:translation_fr.title: Villa avec piscine dbordement, Santa Monica

j:translation_en.description: This breathtaking modern estate nestled in the hills of California redefines contemporary luxury. With over 10,000 square feet of living space, the home features soaring ceilings, expansive glass walls, and seamless indoor-outdoor living. The main level includes a grand foyer, formal living room with custom stone fireplace, open-plan gourmet kitchen with professional-grade appliances, and a dining area overlooking the infinity-edge pool. Upstairs, the master suite offers a private terrace, spa-like bathroom, and walk-in closets. The home also includes a fitness center, cinema room, wine cellar, and guest wing. Ideal for those seeking elegance, space, and ultimate privacy.
j:translation_en.title: Luxury Estate with Infinity Pool Cindyfort, California

j:translation_en.description: An intrepid traveler, traversing continents in search of adventures. His love for exploration is reflected in his approach to luxury real estate, where he guides his clients through uncharted territories of the market, uncovering unique properties and hidden opportunities

j:translation_fr.description: Amateur de voyages intrpide, arpentant les continents la recherche d'aventures. Son amour pour l'exploration se traduit dans son approche de l'immobilier de luxe, o il guide ses clients travers des territoires inconnus du march, dcouvrant des proprits uniques et des opportunits caches.

Theresa Webb est une experte de l'immobilier de luxe, reconnue pour sa capacité à trouver des propriétés exceptionnelles et à offrir des conseils avisés.

En dehors du travail, elle explore passionnément les villes à la recherche de trésors architecturaux, enrichissant ainsi son expertise.

j:translation_en.body:
Located in the heart of the Aegean Sea, Mykonos embodies the charm and sophistication of Greece. Known for its pristine beaches, whitewashed architecture, and iconic windmills, this enchanting island attracts travelers from around the world in search of luxury and tranquility.

The Jewel of the Cyclades

Mykonos, the jewel of the Cyclades, captivates with its picturesque landscapes and enchanting ambiance. From the narrow streets of Chora, the island's capital, to the spectacular vistas from the surrounding hills, every corner of Mykonos exudes timeless elegance.

The Sanctuary of Mediterranean Elegance

Famous for its vibrant nightlife and bustling beaches, Mykonos also offers real estate properties of exceptional elegance. From cliffside villas with panoramic views of the Aegean Sea to traditional homes tucked away in Chora's narrow alleys, each property embodies the refinement of Mediterranean life.

A Dream Destination for Investors

Whether for a luxurious summer getaway or a prestigious real estate investment, Mykonos presents a unique opportunity. With its dynamic real estate market and global reputation, this Greek island continues to attract investors seeking exclusive properties and attractive returns.

Explore the Island of the Gods

Immerse yourself in the enchanting atmosphere of Mykonos by exploring its lively streets, savoring refined Mediterranean cuisine in its picturesque tavernas, and relaxing on its golden sandy beaches. Whether you seek a peaceful retreat or a vibrant escape, Mykonos offers an idyllic setting where every moment is an unforgettable experience.
j:translation_en.subtitle: The Greek Island of Mediterranean Elegance
j:translation_en.title: Mykonos

j:translation_fr.body:
Située au cœur de la mer Égée, Mykonos incarne le charme et le raffinement de la Grèce. Réputée pour ses plages immaculées, son architecture blanchie à la chaux et ses moulins à vent emblématiques, cette île enchanteresse attire des voyageurs du monde entier en quête de luxe et de tranquillité.

Le joyau des Cyclades

Mykonos, le joyau des Cyclades, séduit par ses paysages pittoresques et son ambiance envoûtante. Des ruelles étroites de Chora, la capitale de l’île, aux panoramas spectaculaires offerts par les collines environnantes, chaque recoin de Mykonos respire une élégance intemporelle.

Le sanctuaire de l’élégance méditerranéenne

Célèbre pour sa vie nocturne animée et ses plages effervescentes, Mykonos offre également des propriétés immobilières d’une élégance exceptionnelle. Des villas perchées sur les falaises avec vue panoramique sur la mer Égée aux maisons traditionnelles nichées dans les ruelles de Chora, chaque bien reflète le raffinement de l’art de vivre méditerranéen.

Une destination de rêve pour les investisseurs

Qu’il s’agisse d’une escapade estivale luxueuse ou d’un investissement immobilier prestigieux, Mykonos représente une opportunité unique. Grâce à son marché immobilier dynamique et à sa renommée internationale, cette île grecque continue d’attirer des investisseurs en quête de propriétés exclusives et de rendements attractifs.

Explorez l’île des dieux

Plongez dans l’atmosphère enchanteresse de Mykonos en explorant ses rues animées, en savourant la cuisine méditerranéenne raffinée dans ses tavernes pittoresques et en vous détendant sur ses plages de sable doré. Que vous recherchiez un havre de paix ou une escapade vibrante, Mykonos offre un cadre idyllique où chaque instant devient une expérience inoubliable.
j:translation_fr.subtitle: Le rve Grec
j:translation_fr.title: Mykonos

j:translation_en.body:
The City That Never Sleeps

New York, often nicknamed the Big Apple, is synonymous with luxury and opulence in the world of real estate investment. With its iconic skyline, lively streets, and diverse neighborhoods, New York offers countless opportunities for investors seeking to acquire prestigious properties in one of the most dynamic real estate markets in the world.

A Playground for the Wealthy

From upscale penthouses overlooking Central Park to historic townhouses in the heart of Manhattan, New York offers a wide range of luxury properties tailored to the refined tastes of affluent buyers. From exclusive neighborhoods like Tribeca and the Upper East Side to trendy districts such as Brooklyn and Williamsburg, every investor can find their piece of the New York luxury lifestyle.

Unmatched Investment Potential

Despite occasional fluctuations, New York's real estate market has historically proven to be a secure investment choice, offering long-term appreciation and stability. As a global financial center and cultural hub, the city continues to attract investors from all over the world, ensuring strong demand for luxury properties across all segments of the market.

A Life of Distinction

Owning a luxury property in New York is not just about real estate its about embracing an exceptional lifestyle. From Michelin-starred restaurants and designer boutiques to Broadway shows and exclusive members-only clubs, New York offers an unparalleled array of experiences and services. Living here means immersing yourself in a vibrant, cosmopolitan culture like no other.

Conclusion

In conclusion, New York remains the ultimate destination for luxury real estate investment, offering discerning investors the opportunity to own a piece of one of the worlds most iconic cities. With its diverse property market, strong investment potential, and unmatched lifestyle, the city continues to attract those looking to leave their mark in the world of high-end real estate.
j:translation_en.subtitle: The real estate treasures of the Big Apple
j:translation_en.title: New-York

j:translation_fr.body:
La ville qui ne dort jamais

New York, souvent surnommée la « Grosse Pomme », est synonyme de luxe et d'opulence dans le monde de l'investissement immobilier. Avec sa skyline iconique, ses rues animées et ses quartiers variés, New York offre une multitude d'opportunités aux investisseurs souhaitant acquérir des biens prestigieux dans l’un des marchés immobiliers les plus dynamiques au monde.

Un terrain de jeu pour les plus fortunés

Des penthouses haut de gamme avec vue sur Central Park aux maisons de ville historiques au cœur de Manhattan, New York propose une large gamme de propriétés de luxe répondant aux goûts exigeants des acheteurs aisés. Des quartiers exclusifs comme Tribeca ou l’Upper East Side, aux districts branchés de Brooklyn et Williamsburg, chaque investisseur peut y trouver son morceau du style de vie new-yorkais de luxe.

Un potentiel d’investissement inégalé

Malgré des fluctuations ponctuelles, le marché immobilier new-yorkais a historiquement prouvé qu’il représentait un choix d’investissement sûr, offrant appréciation à long terme et stabilité. En tant que centre financier mondial et épicentre culturel, New York continue d’attirer des investisseurs du monde entier, garantissant une demande soutenue pour les biens de luxe dans tous les segments du marché.

Un art de vivre d’exception

Posséder un bien de luxe à New York, ce n’est pas seulement posséder de l’immobilier : c’est accéder à un art de vivre d’exception. Des restaurants étoilés au guide Michelin, des boutiques de créateurs, des spectacles de Broadway et des clubs privés réservés aux membres, New York offre un éventail incomparable d’expériences et de prestations à ses résidents. Y vivre, c’est s’immerger dans une culture vibrante et cosmopolite unique au monde.

Conclusion

En résumé, New York reste la destination ultime pour l’investissement immobilier de luxe, offrant aux investisseurs la possibilité de posséder un morceau d’une des villes les plus emblématiques au monde. Grâce à un marché immobilier diversifié, un fort potentiel d’investissement et un mode de vie inégalé, la ville continue de séduire les investisseurs exigeants désireux de marquer leur empreinte dans le monde de l’immobilier haut de gamme.
j:translation_fr.subtitle: Les trsors immobiliers de la Grosse Pomme
j:translation_fr.title: New-York

j:translation_en.body:
Discover the Beauty of Geneva

Geneva, a gem nestled in the heart of the Swiss Alps, evokes an atmosphere of timeless elegance, cultural diversity, and refinement. Bordered by the sparkling blue waters of Lake Geneva and surrounded by majestic mountains, this enchanting city captivates visitors from around the world with its breathtaking natural beauty and rich historical heritage.

An Incomparable Way of Life

At the heart of Geneva lies an incomparable way of life, where quality of life is at the center of every aspect of the city. Its first-rate healthcare system, with renowned hospitals and clinics, ensures quality healthcare for its residents. Additionally, Geneva's international schools offer top-notch education, while its reputation for safety and cleanliness makes it a sought-after residential destination for families and professionals worldwide.

A Cosmopolitan City

Geneva is much more than just a Swiss city; it is a true hub of international diplomacy. Hosting numerous international organizations such as the UN, WHO, and ICRC, the city benefits from a rich and vibrant cultural diversity. This diversity is reflected in its lively neighborhoods, where one can discover a multitude of Michelin-starred restaurants, luxury boutiques, and a dynamic nightlife scene.

A Center of Excellence for Business

As a center of excellence for business and innovation, Geneva attracts world-renowned companies and innovative startups. Its business-friendly environment, modern infrastructure, and efficient transportation network make it a strategic choice for international investments. Additionally, Geneva's proximity to other European economic centers makes it a preferred destination for companies seeking new opportunities for growth and expansion.

A Luxury Destination

Whether for a luxury getaway, a prestigious real estate investment, or a rewarding expatriation, Geneva offers a unique experience that combines alpine charm with urban sophistication. With its unique blend of tradition and modernity, Geneva invites you to explore its hidden treasures and live a life of distinction in the heart of the Swiss Alps.
j:translation_en.subtitle: Discover Swiss excellence
j:translation_en.title: The latest news from Geneva and around

j:translation_fr.body:
Découvrez la beauté de Genève

Genève, joyau niché au cœur des Alpes suisses, évoque une atmosphère d’élégance intemporelle, de diversité culturelle et de raffinement. Bordée par les eaux scintillantes du lac Léman et entourée de montagnes majestueuses, cette ville enchanteresse séduit les visiteurs du monde entier par sa beauté naturelle à couper le souffle et son riche patrimoine historique.

Un art de vivre incomparable

Au cœur de Genève règne un art de vivre incomparable, où la qualité de vie est au centre de toutes les attentions. Son système de santé de premier ordre, avec ses hôpitaux et cliniques de renommée internationale, garantit des soins de grande qualité à ses résidents. De plus, les écoles internationales de Genève offrent un enseignement d’excellence, tandis que sa réputation en matière de sécurité et de propreté en fait une destination résidentielle prisée des familles et des professionnels du monde entier.

Une ville cosmopolite

Genève est bien plus qu’une simple ville suisse : c’est un véritable carrefour de la diplomatie internationale. Accueillant de nombreuses organisations telles que l’ONU, l’OMS ou encore le CICR, la ville bénéficie d’une richesse culturelle dynamique. Cette diversité se reflète dans ses quartiers animés, où l’on trouve une multitude de restaurants étoilés, de boutiques de luxe et une vie nocturne trépidante.

Un pôle d’excellence économique

En tant que centre d’excellence pour les affaires et l’innovation, Genève attire des entreprises de renommée mondiale ainsi que des start-ups innovantes. Son environnement favorable aux affaires, ses infrastructures modernes et son réseau de transport efficace en font un choix stratégique pour les investissements internationaux. De plus, sa proximité avec d’autres pôles économiques européens renforce son attractivité pour les entreprises en quête de croissance et d’expansion.

Une destination de luxe

Que ce soit pour une escapade haut de gamme, un investissement immobilier prestigieux ou une expatriation enrichissante, Genève offre une expérience unique alliant charme alpin et sophistication urbaine. Grâce à son savant mélange de tradition et de modernité, la ville vous invite à explorer ses trésors cachés et à vivre une vie d’exception au cœur des Alpes suisses.
j:translation_fr.subtitle: Dcouvrez lexcellence suisse
j:translation_fr.title: Les dernires actualits de Genve et ses environs

j:translation_en.body:
A City of Opportunities

Paris, the French capital, has long been a stronghold for luxury real estate investment. With its dynamic and diverse real estate market, Paris offers a multitude of opportunities for investors looking to acquire high-end properties. Whether it's elegant apartments in upscale neighborhoods or sumptuous private mansions in the heart of the city, Paris has something to satisfy the highest demands of real estate investors.

An Exceptional Real Estate Heritage

Paris's appeal lies in its rich real estate heritage, composed of beautifully preserved historical buildings and renowned contemporary constructions. From prestigious apartments offering panoramic views of the city's iconic landmarks to private residences hidden behind historic facades, each property in Paris tells a story of elegance and sophistication.

A Stable and Prosperous Market

The Parisian real estate market is known for its stability and resilience, even in the face of global economic fluctuations. Real estate investors benefit from a dynamic market supported by constant demand for luxury properties from affluent national and international clientele. Additionally, attractive tax incentives and favorable financing conditions make Paris a strategic choice for long-term real estate investments.

An Incomparable Lifestyle

Investing in luxury real estate in Paris goes beyond financial considerations. It's also about investing in an unparalleled lifestyle, steeped in culture, history, and sophistication. Buyers of luxury real estate in Paris have access to a multitude of high-end services, from Michelin-starred restaurants to world-renowned designer boutiques, to exclusive private clubs. Owning a property in Paris is immersing oneself in a lifestyle where French art de vivre meets contemporary luxury.

Conclusion

Whether to diversify an investment portfolio, acquire a second home, or settle in the City of Light, investing in luxury real estate in Paris offers unparalleled benefits. With its dynamic real estate market, exceptional real estate heritage, and incomparable lifestyle, Paris remains a top destination for discerning real estate investors seeking prestigious and sustainable investment opportunities.

 

Paris remains an essential destination for luxury real estate investors looking for exceptional properties in one of the world's most coveted cities.
j:translation_en.subtitle: The Destination for Luxury Real Estate Investment
j:translation_en.title: Paris
